MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　クー公のほうが筋肉担当なのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? So Little Kuu is in charge of muscles!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? So Little Kuu is in charge of muscles!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、そういう意味で否定したんじゃなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No no, that's not what I meant...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No no, that's not what I meant...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　マッスルメイトだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? What she wants is a muscle mate, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? What she wants is a muscle mate, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは初めて聞く未知の言葉だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've never heard of such a thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've never heard of such a thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ルーーーム・メイトですよ、井ノ原さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, it's ROOM mate, Inohara-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, it's ROOM mate, Inohara-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、ルームメイトかよ、最初からそう言えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, a roommate? You should have said that in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, a roommate? You should have said that in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドがふたりのほうがいいっていうからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud wants someone to live with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud wants someone to live with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: げぇ直枝の奴ツッコまずにスルーしてみせた！　という尊敬の声がどこからか漏れ聞こえてきたがそれもスルーする。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a few classmates say ❝Look, Naoe ignored Masato's stupid comment!❞, but I ignored them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a few classmates say ❝Look, Naoe ignored Masato's stupid comment!❞, but I ignored them.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ふーん。そんなもんか。まぁ、女つーのはつるむのが好きだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is that so? Well, I know girls like to spend time with friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is that so? Well, I know girls like to spend time with friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「鈴みたいなのは例外だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Someone like Rin's an exception, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Someone like Rin's an exception, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「意外と寂しがり屋なのな、クー公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I didn't know you got lonely easily, Little Kuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I didn't know you got lonely easily, Little Kuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そ、そんなことは…ないこともあることもないこともないかもあるかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, it's not like that... But maybe you're right, no, you're wrong, no, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, it's not like that... But maybe you're right, no, you're wrong, no, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは恥ずかしそうに俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast her eyes down sheepishly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast her eyes down sheepishly.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まぁがんばって筋肉質な奴を探しな。やっぱ筋肉がそばにあるってのは頼もしいもんだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Anyway, I hope you can find a well-muscled girl. I'm sure she'll be dependable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Anyway, I hope you can find a well-muscled girl. I'm sure she'll be dependable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まぁ、特に必要性はないけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think the muscles are really that big a factor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think the muscles are really that big a factor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まぁな。でも必ず必要な時はくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Maybe. But you're really gonna need muscle someday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Maybe. But you're really gonna need muscle someday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来たことないけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not so far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not so far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「来るさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もうすぐ予鈴ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The first bell's about to ring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The first bell's about to ring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「とぅ・びー・こんてぃにゅー・ねくすと・やすみ・たーいむっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Tu bi- kontinyu- nekusuto yasumi taimu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Tu bi- kontinyu- nekusuto yasumi taimu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「続くんだ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To be continued!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To be continued!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: かも『やすみたいむ』って何っ。
MESSAGE.EN: And what's with that ❛yasumi taimu❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: And what's with that ❛yasumi taimu❜?

MESSAGE.JP: み時間になった。
MESSAGE.EN: The next break arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next break arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よし、何して遊ぶ？　久々にボーリングなんてどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, what are we gonna do now? How about bowling? We haven't done that in ages.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, what are we gonna do now? How about bowling? We haven't done that in ages.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、今クドの相談に乗ってる最中だし、そんな派手に遊ぶこと自体休み時間には無理だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I need to talk with Kud about her room-sharing. And it's just a short break, so there isn't enough time for that anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I need to talk with Kud about her room-sharing. And it's just a short break, so there isn't enough time for that anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は立ち上がったクドを目配せして呼んであげた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up, making eye contact with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up, making eye contact with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…しかし、どうしたものかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, I wonder what we should do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, I wonder what we should do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ど、顔を突き合わせるだけでは案は浮かばない。
MESSAGE.EN: We weren't getting any good ideas just by looking at each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We weren't getting any good ideas just by looking at each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「見つからなかったら見つからないで寂しい気もするし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'll make you feel even lonelier if we can't come up with any candidates for roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'll make you feel even lonelier if we can't come up with any candidates for roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですね…出来たら、その、一人は嫌です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes... I don't like being alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes... I don't like being alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…新学期が始まって間もないのに部屋を移動しようという生徒は普通いないだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I guess there won't be many students who'd want to change their room now since the semester's already started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I guess there won't be many students who'd want to change their room now since the semester's already started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意に頭の上から声が降ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly a voice came from above.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly a voice came from above.

MESSAGE.JP: り返ると、紙パックをストローで吸う恭介が、窓辺に降り立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking back, we found Kyousuke standing by the window, drinking a carton of juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking back, we found Kyousuke standing by the window, drinking a carton of juice.

MESSAGE.JP: つもそうだ。漫画のようにこうしていいところで現れ、格好良く助言して去っていくんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This always happens. He suddenly appears, dispenses advice and vanishes, like a scene in a manga.
MESSAGE.Translation: This always happens. He suddenly appears, dispenses advice and vanishes, like a scene in a manga.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「寮長もそんなこと言ってたかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The girls' dorm head said something like that too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The girls' dorm head said something like that too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だろうな。よほど気にくわない相手だった、とかなら別だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She's right. I think if you really hated your roommate, she'd allow you to change rooms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She's right. I think if you really hated your roommate, she'd allow you to change rooms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今の時期ではそこまでわからないだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But that's an unlikely situation now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But that's an unlikely situation now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、クドの相手は見つけられないってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you saying Kud won't be able to find a roommate at all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you saying Kud won't be able to find a roommate at all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうでもない。いくらでもやりようはあるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, I'm not. There's plenty of ways to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, I'm not. There's plenty of ways to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「棗さん、どうやるんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Natsume-san, could you tell me how?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Natsume-san, could you tell me how?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「現在部屋にひとりでいる知り合いに頼むのが一番手っ取り早い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's probably best to ask those who live alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's probably best to ask those who live alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「能美としてはどうなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think, Noumi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think, Noumi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私はどなたでもいいんですけど…お願いできるなら、顔見知りの方のほうがいいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Anyone would be fine... But I'd like someone I already know if possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Anyone would be fine... But I'd like someone I already know if possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ただ、あまりご無理もいえませんし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But I don't want to bother everyone anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But I don't want to bother everyone anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは控えめに答える。
MESSAGE.EN: Her answer was a bit self-deprecating.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her answer was a bit self-deprecating.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「顔見知りの女子ぐらいいるだろ？　理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You've got a lot of female friends, don't you, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You've got a lot of female friends, don't you, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, well yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, well yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「というわけだ。うまく見つかるといいな、能美」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And there you have it. Good luck, Noumi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And there you have it. Good luck, Noumi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい！　ありがとうございます、棗さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes! Thank you very much, Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes! Thank you very much, Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はパン、と紙パックを片手で器用に畳むと、それを近くのゴミ箱に突っ込んで教室から出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke skillfully folded up his juice carton with one hand, and tossed it into a trash can as he left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke skillfully folded up his juice carton with one hand, and tossed it into a trash can as he left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: ほらね。みごとな去り方だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Check it out, he wrapped it up beautifully.
MESSAGE.Translation: Check it out, he wrapped it up beautifully.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「では、直枝さん、誰に最初に声をかけたらいいと思いますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Say, Naoe-san. Who do you think I should ask first?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Say, Naoe-san. Who do you think I should ask first?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがそんなことを訊いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…僕、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What about me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んでか知らないがそんなことを僕は口走っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I blurted out, although I wasn't sure why.
MESSAGE.Translation: I blurted out, although I wasn't sure why.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Huhe!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Huhe!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがびっくりしたように変な声を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She made a strange yelp in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made a strange yelp in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ななな、直枝さんれすか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Na,na,na, Naoe-san, are you sure!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Na,na,na, Naoe-san, are you sure!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えと、その、あの、あの、あのあのっお気持ちは大変嬉しいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, well, I'm, I'm, I'm really grateful for your offer, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, well, I'm, I'm, I'm really grateful for your offer, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは真っ赤になって俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked down bashfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked down bashfully.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でもその、寮の規則もありますし、というより、なんですか、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We have to follow the dorm rules and, and before that, I mean, er...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We have to follow the dorm rules and, and before that, I mean, er...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でもそんな、そんなことは、あっていいのかと言われると」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Even so, if we could share a room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Even so, if we could share a room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あったほうがいいよーな気もしますし、でもこんなのはすこし予想外で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...maybe it'd be great. But your offer is kind of unexpected.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...maybe it'd be great. But your offer is kind of unexpected.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あの、直枝さんにはっ…すてきなひとがいっぱいですしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, and I think there are lots of nice girls around you, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, and I think there are lots of nice girls around you, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは両手をぱたぱたと振り回して、あるいは上にやったり下にやったり忙しなく動かした。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud gestured wildly with both hands, up, down, left, right, center; each new gesture more hurried than the last.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud gestured wildly with both hands, up, down, left, right, center; each new gesture more hurried than the last.

MESSAGE.JP: んか水飲み鳥のオモチャっぽい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like watching one of those water-drinking toy birds.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like watching one of those water-drinking toy birds.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちょっと待てぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait a sec...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait a sec...❞

MESSAGE.JP: を伏せていた真人が静かに言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, who had lowered his head, said quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, who had lowered his head, said quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「こいつはちぃとキツイぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This is kinda cruel...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This is kinda cruel...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それって…オレが理樹に嫌われちまったってことじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, what you said means... you hate me, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, what you said means... you hate me, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: わ、真人が傷ついている!!
MESSAGE.EN: Whoops, it seems like I've hurt him!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoops, it seems like I've hurt him!!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そんな、真人から逃げようとかそういうわけじゃなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it doesn't. It's not like I want to get away from you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it doesn't. It's not like I want to get away from you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「筋肉が足らなかったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't have enough muscles to satisfy you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't have enough muscles to satisfy you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「むしろ逆だし…落ち着いてよ、ね。僕はどこにもいかないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You do... Calm down, okay? I'm not going anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You do... Calm down, okay? I'm not going anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ならいいが…オレの心はナイーブなんだぜ、覚えておいてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay... But just remember I have a naive mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay... But just remember I have a naive mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「むしろそっちを鍛えてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe you should train your mind instead of your body...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe you should train your mind instead of your body...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、もとを正せば、僕がおかしな発言をしたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking back, it was my fault for saying something weird to begin with.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking back, it was my fault for saying something weird to begin with.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは真っ白い耳まで真っ赤にして俯いてしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was still looking at the floor; she was red to her ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was still looking at the floor; she was red to her ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、ごめん、冗談、ジョーク、いっつあじょーく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, sorry, just kidding. Joke, ittsu a jouku.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, sorry, just kidding. Joke, ittsu a jouku.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, ah...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, ah...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはぴょん！と飛びあがらんばかりに顔を上げ目を見開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted her head, opening her eyes widely as if she was about to jump into the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted her head, opening her eyes widely as if she was about to jump into the air.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「じょ、ジョークですか、あ、なるほど、はい、えーと、これがアメリカンなわけですね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Jo, jouku? Oh I see. Yes, well, it's an American joke, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Jo, jouku? Oh I see. Yes, well, it's an American joke, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやアメリカンというわけじゃないけど、冗談だよ、冗談」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not American. It's just a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not American. It's just a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「い、いえ。その、そうですよね、うん、びっくりしました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝N, no, that, that's right... yes, that was just such a surprise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝N, no, that, that's right... yes, that was just such a surprise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは胸に手を当てて、ほぅ、と息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand to her chest, heaving a sigh of relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand to her chest, heaving a sigh of relief.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「びっくりしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That took me by surprise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That took me by surprise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、それはわかったから。ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know. I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know. I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえ。びっくりしただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I was just so surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I was just so surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはにっこり笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud beamed a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud beamed a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それで、誰がいいでしょうかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, who do you think would be best to ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, who do you think would be best to ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はどうだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What about Rin?
MESSAGE.Translation: What about Rin?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: えただけでも難しそうだけど、やってみる価値はあるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: That might be worth trying, but it's difficult just thinking about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That might be worth trying, but it's difficult just thinking about it.

MESSAGE.JP: の人見知りは筋金入りだからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Because Rin's shy to the bone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Because Rin's shy to the bone...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうしましたかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What's on your mind?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What's on your mind?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、鈴はどうかと思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, well I was wondering whether it'd work out with Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, well I was wondering whether it'd work out with Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「鈴さんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「前にご一緒したときは、全然お話が出来なかったのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When we used to share a room, we didn't talk even once...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When we used to share a room, we didn't talk even once...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うか。最初は臨時的に鈴の部屋にクドは厄介になっていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It reminded me that Kud had temporarily stayed in Rin's room before.
MESSAGE.Translation: It reminded me that Kud had temporarily stayed in Rin's room before.

MESSAGE.JP: の鈴が校内を案内するはずだったのに、結局僕と一緒に案内して、そして案の定、僕しかクドと話さなかったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin had been supposed to give Kud a guided tour of the school, but I ended up playing that role. Besides that, Rin, just as I suspected, hadn't made any conversation with Kud at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin had been supposed to give Kud a guided tour of the school, but I ended up playing that role. Besides that, Rin, just as I suspected, hadn't made any conversation with Kud at all.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今度は仲良くしてくれるでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do you think we could become good friends this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do you think we could become good friends this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、じゃあちょっと訊いてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go ask her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go ask her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝OK!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝OK!❞

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、クドの人懐っこさなら何とかなるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's sincerity might be able to give them a fresh start.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's sincerity might be able to give them a fresh start.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いや、やっぱりあんまり期待しないでいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, we should probably keep our expectations realistic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, we should probably keep our expectations realistic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝H-huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝H-huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: り廊下に移動すると、相変らず鈴が猫に囲まれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When we reached the connecting corridor, we found Rin surrounded by a horde of cats as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we reached the connecting corridor, we found Rin surrounded by a horde of cats as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちょっと待ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait a moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait a moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃーにゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「待ってろ…というか、待てっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Just wait... No, stop it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Just wait... No, stop it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふひゃ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fhya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fhya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: り首にはまりそうになった猫を慌てて摘み出す鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin hastily grabbed a cat that was trying to sneak under her collar shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin hastily grabbed a cat that was trying to sneak under her collar shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちょっと待っ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait a mi...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait a mi...❞

MESSAGE.JP: らわらわら。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bustle*bustle*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bustle*bustle*.

MESSAGE.JP: いのけられる遊びと勘違いしたのか猫たちが集まってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Misunderstanding Rin's actions, probably thinking she was going to groom them, the other cats gathered around her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Misunderstanding Rin's actions, probably thinking she was going to groom them, the other cats gathered around her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…こら、髪の毛ひっぱるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Hey, don't pull my hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Hey, don't pull my hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手元を見ると麻紐を弄っているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed she was doing something with a hemp string.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed she was doing something with a hemp string.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ひっぱるなっ！　ほらっ、できたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't pull it! Here, it's done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't pull it! Here, it's done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しぺし。麻紐が地面を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: *Swoosh*swoosh*. She whipped the ground with the string.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Swoosh*swoosh*. She whipped the ground with the string.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃ！　にゃにゃっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow! Meow meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow! Meow meow!

MESSAGE.JP: たちの視線が一斉に紐に向く。
MESSAGE.EN: All the cats were watching the string.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the cats were watching the string.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「自信作だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is my masterpiece.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is my masterpiece.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がうねうねと紐を動かす度に猫たちは大喜びで飛びつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time she moved the string, the cats were trying to catch it with great delight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time she moved the string, the cats were trying to catch it with great delight.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うんうん。たのしーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Good, I'm glad you guys are enjoying this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Good, I'm glad you guys are enjoying this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしもたのしーぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's fun for me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's fun for me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こっちにも一本あったりする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Look, I have another one here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Look, I have another one here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「たのしさ倍増だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝With this it's twice the fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝With this it's twice the fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: さかさ。
MESSAGE.EN: She brought out another string.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brought out another string.

MESSAGE.JP: が違うと思ったら梱包に使うプラスティックテープだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Noticing it make a different sound this time, I could see that it was made of duct tape.
MESSAGE.Translation: Noticing it make a different sound this time, I could see that it was made of duct tape.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃにゃぅー！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ほれほれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Catch, catch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Catch, catch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow!

MESSAGE.JP: く紐に興奮しきったのか鈴の肩に飛び乗って狙う猫も現われた。
MESSAGE.EN: A few of the cats went crazy for it, jumping onto her shoulders in order to catch it.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few of the cats went crazy for it, jumping onto her shoulders in order to catch it.

MESSAGE.JP: らわら。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, the other cats followed suit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, the other cats followed suit.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「って、重っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're too heavy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're too heavy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃにゃー！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow!

MESSAGE.JP: が止まっているにもかかわらず猫たちは鈴の背中を目指す。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she'd already stopped playing with the strings, cats were still climbing her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she'd already stopped playing with the strings, cats were still climbing her back.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そしておまえたちは紐はどーでもよくなってるだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You guys don't care about the strings anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You guys don't care about the strings anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「たのしそーだからいーけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But that's okay. You guys seem to be having fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But that's okay. You guys seem to be having fun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はくすくす笑っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She giggled a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: She giggled a little.

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ声をかけよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should call out to her soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should call out to her soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「機嫌はよさそうだよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, she looks happy now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, she looks happy now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「早速ご挨拶なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's say hello, then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's say hello, then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「早速ご挨拶なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's say hi!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's say hi!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: よりも早く駆けだしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd already started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd already started running.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふーっ!!　こんにちはなのですーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu-!! Good afternoon to you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu-!! Good afternoon to you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: たぱたと走っていくと。
MESSAGE.EN: She started running toward Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started running toward Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: ーーっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Scramble*――!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scramble*――!!

MESSAGE.JP: りの猫と一緒に物陰に隠れてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and the cats scurried into hiding.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and the cats scurried into hiding.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いきなりで驚かせちゃったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You took her by surprise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You took her by surprise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わ、わふー、警戒されてますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-, did I scare her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-, did I scare her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、まあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, probably...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, probably...❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず僕が鈴を連れ戻してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I brought Rin to Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brought Rin to Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: っきのせいか、鈴は僕の後ろにしがみついたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She hid behind me, clinging to my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hid behind me, clinging to my back.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「鈴さん、こんにちはなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san, good afternoon to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san, good afternoon to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は後ろに隠れたままでこくこくと頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin nodded twice, still hiding behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin nodded twice, still hiding behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...O, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...O, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと顔を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She poked her head out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She poked her head out.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こんにちは、ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん…こんにち…は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah... Good after... noon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah... Good after... noon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とか挨拶は出来たようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin could manage to greet back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin could manage to greet back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでさ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドが今ルームメイトを探してるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud is looking for a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud is looking for a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ルームメイト？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Roommate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Roommate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ、一緒のお部屋で生活するのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I'd like someone to live with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I'd like someone to live with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最初、そうしてたでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You lived with Kud before, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You lived with Kud before, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 切れの悪い返事。あまりいい思い出ではなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a noncommittal response. Seems like those weren't very fond memories for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a noncommittal response. Seems like those weren't very fond memories for her.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり鈴の性格ではダメか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it was impossible after all, given Rin's personality...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it was impossible after all, given Rin's personality...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり無理そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it won't work...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it won't work...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、おまえがやればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, you do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, you do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ダメだよ。僕は男だから女子寮入れないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't. I'm not allowed to live in the girls' dorm because I'm a guy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't. I'm not allowed to live in the girls' dorm because I'm a guy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつめられたように頭を抱え出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hands on her head as if she were at a loss.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hands on her head as if she were at a loss.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…鈴さん、ダメならしょうがないのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Rin-san, it can't be helped, you don't have to force yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Rin-san, it can't be helped, you don't have to force yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「悩んでくれただけでも、私は嬉しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm just glad you gave it some thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm just glad you gave it some thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、もう少しだけ仲良くしてくれると、もっと嬉しいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's just that it would be great if we could become better friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's just that it would be great if we could become better friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、クドのほうをみると。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin glanced at Kud,
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin glanced at Kud,

MESSAGE.JP: とつ、ちりんと頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: and nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: and nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドもそれで嬉しそうな顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud was satisfied with Rin's reaction and smiled happily.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud was satisfied with Rin's reaction and smiled happily.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、もしかしたらって思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry. I thought it was going to work out better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry. I thought it was going to work out better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえいえ、仕方がないのです。誰にだって都合や事情はあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, you don't have to apologize. Everyone has their own problems to deal with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, you don't have to apologize. Everyone has their own problems to deal with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはそういうが、ちょっと寂しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She may have said so, but she still looked a little sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: She may have said so, but she still looked a little sad.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今回はダメでしたが、次はがんばるのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This time was a failure, but I'll do better next time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This time was a failure, but I'll do better next time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ふぁいと、おーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fight! Ohhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fight! Ohhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐにやる気になる。
MESSAGE.EN: She got motivated quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got motivated quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…僕もがんばらないとなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...I should put some effort in as well.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...I should put some effort in as well.)

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり、何とかしてあげたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I resolved once again to find some way to help her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I resolved once again to find some way to help her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さんとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はあ、小毬さんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、小毬さんなら喜んで引き受けてくれると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think she'd welcome your offer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think she'd welcome your offer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですね、今度の休み時間にでも聞いてみましょうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay. Let's ask her next break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay. Let's ask her next break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Break time.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Where is she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Where is she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 室にはすでに小毬さんの姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san had already vanished from the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san had already vanished from the room.

MESSAGE.JP: の人、結構落ち着きなく動き回るからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Quite a spirited one, that girl...
MESSAGE.Translation: Quite a spirited one, that girl...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうしましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What are we going to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What are we going to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、自販機にでも行ってみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go get a couple of soft drinks from the vending machine out in the courtyard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go get a couple of soft drinks from the vending machine out in the courtyard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「中庭に行ってるとしたら、途中で会うかもしれないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We might bump into her out there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We might bump into her out there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人で裏庭に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: We headed for the backyard first.
MESSAGE.Translation: We headed for the backyard first.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はあー、裏庭は結構好きだったりします。森林浴ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love this place, it's so relaxing walking here and breathing in the forest air.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love this place, it's so relaxing walking here and breathing in the forest air.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、僕もここは結構好きかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, so do I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, so do I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 々の合間にある歩道を並んで歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: We walked along the pathway lined with trees.
MESSAGE.Translation: We walked along the pathway lined with trees.

MESSAGE.JP: の緑の隙間から、快晴の空を見上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Between the gaps we could see the brilliantly sunny sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Between the gaps we could see the brilliantly sunny sky.

MESSAGE.JP: この天気なら、小毬さんが外をうろついていそうな気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I bet Komari-san's outside now since she enjoys nice weather...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I bet Komari-san's outside now since she enjoys nice weather...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いました、小毬さんですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Look, it's Komari-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Look, it's Komari-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、やっぱり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, just as I thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, just as I thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの指差す方向をみると、小毬さんがなにやら校舎の方を見上げているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned my eyes in the direction Kud was pointing and found Komari-san gazing up at the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned my eyes in the direction Kud was pointing and found Komari-san gazing up at the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何してんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's she doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's she doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さ、さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず声掛けてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's try talking to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's try talking to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんは余程夢中になっているのか、僕らが近付いていっても気付く気配すらない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so lost in thought that she didn't seem to notice as we approached.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so lost in thought that she didn't seem to notice as we approached.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…小毬さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ほわぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: く、と反応して振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She was startled and turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was startled and turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ…な、なんだ、理樹君かぁ…びっくりしたよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh... What, it's you, Riki-kun... You really caught me off guard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh... What, it's you, Riki-kun... You really caught me off guard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや別にびっくりさせるつもりはなかったんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to surprise you, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to surprise you, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おーこまーりーほわっつはぷん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, Koma-ri-, howattsu hapun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, Koma-ri-, howattsu hapun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？　大困り？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Ookomari?❞ (Big problem.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Ookomari?❞ (Big problem.)

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Iesu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Iesu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…たぶんそれは、ちがう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I think she meant something else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I think she meant something else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だいじょうぶだよ、クーちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's okay, Kuu-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's okay, Kuu-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と肩を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She clapped Kud on the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clapped Kud on the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「大丈夫ですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、ちょっと困ることがあっても、きっとだいじょうぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yup. Even if you've got a bit of a problem, I'm sure everything will work out fine in the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yup. Even if you've got a bit of a problem, I'm sure everything will work out fine in the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですね、大丈夫ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, you're right. It'll be okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, you're right. It'll be okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「通じてないのに会話って成り立つもんなんだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Although they're misunderstanding each other, it's going smoothly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Although they're misunderstanding each other, it's going smoothly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それでこまーりーさんは何をしていたんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, what are you doing here, Koma-ri-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, what are you doing here, Koma-ri-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、ほら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, you see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, you see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんが校舎の壁の片隅を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed to a corner of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed to a corner of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: ツバメの巣だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A bird's nest.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A bird's nest.

MESSAGE.JP: めていると、ひょい、と一匹のツバメが顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: A swallow peeked out its head as we looked.
MESSAGE.Translation: A swallow peeked out its head as we looked.

MESSAGE.JP: ると、どこからかもう一匹のツバメが飛んできて、その巣に留まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, another swallow swooped down and landed in the nest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, another swallow swooped down and landed in the nest.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はうぁっ、むちゃんこ可愛いですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hau～, they're so cute～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hau～, they're so cute～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「一匹だけね、まだ飛べなくて残ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There's one swallow that can't fly yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There's one swallow that can't fly yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…他のみんなは、もうびゅんびゅん飛び回ってるのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...All the others are already out flying around, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...All the others are already out flying around, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「お母さんが残ってるけど、どうしても飛べないみたいなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mama swallow stays with it but it still doesn't seem able to fly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mama swallow stays with it but it still doesn't seem able to fly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それは可哀想です…このままじゃ、あのツバメさん残されていってしまいますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I feel sorry for it... At this rate it might end up the only one left in the nest!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I feel sorry for it... At this rate it might end up the only one left in the nest!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、だからたまにここに来て応援してるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep. I'm here to cheer it on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep. I'm here to cheer it on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんらしいな、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's so like her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's so like her.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ふぁいとですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fight!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fight!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが呼びかける。
MESSAGE.EN: She called out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called out.

MESSAGE.JP: けどやっぱり、すぐには無理みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It looks like it needs more time to get ready, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It looks like it needs more time to get ready, though.

MESSAGE.JP: とまず表側の中庭に移動し、小毬さんにルームメイトのことを相談してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: We moved into the courtyard and began discussing Kud's room-sharing.
MESSAGE.Translation: We moved into the courtyard and began discussing Kud's room-sharing.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、クーちゃんとなら楽しくなりそうだねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah, it'd be fun living together with you, Kuu-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, it'd be fun living together with you, Kuu-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、とても楽しいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, very fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, very fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「とても楽しくて笑いが絶えません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So much fun we wouldn't be able to stop laughing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So much fun we wouldn't be able to stop laughing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そして最終的に笑いすぎて横隔膜が痙攣・窒息しかけて救急車で運ばれますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And we'd laugh so much, making our diaphragms cramp up, that we'd suffocate and be sent to the hospital in an ambulance!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And we'd laugh so much, making our diaphragms cramp up, that we'd suffocate and be sent to the hospital in an ambulance!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやそのアピールの仕方はどうだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's a good way to talk her over...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's a good way to talk her over...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「$K18どきどき$K0…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝$K18Doki doki$K0...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝$K18Doki doki$K0...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 張を口に出して小毬さんの返事を待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was waiting for Komari-san's answer with a pounding heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was waiting for Komari-san's answer with a pounding heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、ごめんね、私もうルームメイトの人いるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I'm sorry, I already have a roommate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I'm sorry, I already have a roommate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ガーン!?　…そうだったんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Gahhn!? ...Is that how it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Gahhn!? ...Is that how it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、とため息をついて肩を落とす。
MESSAGE.EN: She sighed, drooping her shoulders in disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sighed, drooping her shoulders in disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあしょうがないね。小毬さんならいいルームメイトになってくれると思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's too bad. I thought you'd be a good roommate for her, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's too bad. I thought you'd be a good roommate for her, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、でもだいじょうぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「きっと見つかるよ、いいひと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm sure you'll find someone really nice, Kuu-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm sure you'll find someone really nice, Kuu-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…はい、そうですねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Yes, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Yes, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは心底残念そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud looked really smitten.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud looked really smitten.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、小毬さんならいいルームメイトになってくれそうなんだけどなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's really a shame, I'm sure they would've made great roommates...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's really a shame, I'm sure they would've made great roommates...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さんなんてどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「来ヶ谷さんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、まあクドとも面識はあるし、向こうも悪からず思ってるみたいだしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. You know her already and she doesn't seem to dislike you either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. You know her already and she doesn't seem to dislike you either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、来ヶ谷さんならだいじょうぶかと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. I think she'd be a good roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. I think she'd be a good roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お姉さんみたいですよね、来ヶ谷さんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Kurugaya-san feels like a big sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Kurugaya-san feels like a big sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあそうだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think so, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think so, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「しかもスタイルもよくて、背が高くて、頭もよくて、英語が出来て、おっぱいが大きくて、びしっと大人な物腰です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And she has great style; she's tall, and smart, she speaks English, has enormous breasts, and she's sophisticated too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And she has great style; she's tall, and smart, she speaks English, has enormous breasts, and she's sophisticated too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「スタイル悪くて、背が低くて、頭が悪くて、英語が出来なくて、おっぱいが小さくて、ふにゃっと子供な物腰の私とは、えらい違いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Totally different from someone short, stupid and flat-chested like me who can't even speak English and acts like a baby.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Totally different from someone short, stupid and flat-chested like me who can't even speak English and acts like a baby.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…言っててなんか悲しくなってきました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I feel kinda sad after saying all that out loud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I feel kinda sad after saying all that out loud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ来ヶ谷さんを構成する要素は、見事にクドと対極にあるように思う。
MESSAGE.EN: If you put it like that, it really does seem like they're the polar opposites of each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you put it like that, it really does seem like they're the polar opposites of each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもさ、あの人と一緒ならきっと楽しいと思うよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I think it'd be fun living with her; don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I think it'd be fun living with her; don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、それは私もそう思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I think so, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I think so, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でも、ちょっとたまに抱きつかれたり、くるくる回されたりするのが苦手だったりします…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But, I don't really like it when she hugs me or spins me around...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But, I don't really like it when she hugs me or spins me around...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ、それはそういう人だしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well, that's the way she is, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well, that's the way she is, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いつか私が来ヶ谷さんを回して見せます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm going to spin her around, some day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm going to spin her around, some day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『$K37よいではないか$K0よいではないか』『あれぇ～』と回すのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll spin her around and around, saying ❛$K37Isn't this fun?$K0 Isn't this fun?❜ and make her say ❛Oh no～.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll spin her around and around, saying ❛$K37Isn't this fun?$K0 Isn't this fun?❜ and make her say ❛Oh no～.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「一生掛かっても無理な気がします…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But something tells me I could never do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But something tells me I could never do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの人無敵だからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's invincible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's invincible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、そういうわけで来ヶ谷さんを探して声をかけることに。
MESSAGE.EN: Since it was decided, we tried calling out her name to find her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since it was decided, we tried calling out her name to find her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She isn't here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She isn't here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「朝には見かけたんですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I did see her this morning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I did see her this morning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、この短時間で教室からいなくなるなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did she disappear so quickly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did she disappear so quickly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どこにいったんでしょうねえ、来ヶ谷さんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Where on Earth did she go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Where on Earth did she go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「次の休み時間しかないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing to do but wait for the next break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing to do but wait for the next break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の授業の号令が始まるタイミングで、来ヶ谷さんが教室に戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san returned when the bell rang as the next class began.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san returned when the bell rang as the next class began.

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば、こんな事が多いんだよなぁ、来ヶ谷さんは。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking back on it, this happens all the time; she always disappears during breaks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking back on it, this happens all the time; she always disappears during breaks.

MESSAGE.JP: 業中の来ヶ谷さんは、例によってつまらなそうな表情で、ハードカバーの本に目を通していた。
MESSAGE.EN: As always, Kurugaya-san was reading a hardcover book with a bored expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: As always, Kurugaya-san was reading a hardcover book with a bored expression.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿をクドがじっと見つめている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was staring at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was staring at her.

MESSAGE.JP: うやら、狙いを定めているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems that Kud was determined to catch her as soon as the class ends.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems that Kud was determined to catch her as soon as the class ends.

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「じゃあ、号令」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝That's all for today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝That's all for today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒@「きりーつ、れい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Stand up, bow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Stand up, bow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「行くのですっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm going!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm going!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直後、クドが来ヶ谷さんに向かって突貫。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She immediately rushed toward Kurugaya-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She immediately rushed toward Kurugaya-san...

MESSAGE.JP: してそのままラグビータックルの要領で捕まえにかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and tried to grab her, using a rugby tackle.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and tried to grab her, using a rugby tackle.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「捕まえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Gotcha――❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Gotcha――❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょい。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoosh*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoosh*.

MESSAGE.JP: んっ!!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!!

MESSAGE.JP: 机に突っ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And Kud slammed into a desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And Kud slammed into a desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、あちゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh my god...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh my god...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…何をやってるのかねキミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「い、痛いですー…わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It hurts... Wafu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It hurts... Wafu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ、クドの努力もちょっとは認めてあげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well, you should at least praise the effort she made.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well, you should at least praise the effort she made.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんだ、机に突っ込む努力か？　それとも自分を痛めつける努力か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Effort at what? You mean crashing into a desk or knocking herself out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Effort at what? You mean crashing into a desk or knocking herself out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…いつかぎゃふんと言わせてみせるのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm going to make you speechless with surprise some day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm going to make you speechless with surprise some day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろぼろになりながら、少女の決意。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud declared her determination as she staggered up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud declared her determination as she staggered up.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対無理だとは思うけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's definitely not going to happen, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's definitely not going to happen, though.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それで、私に何か用か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, what do you want with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, what do you want with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あー、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドがルームメイト募集してるのは前に話したよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I told you Kud was looking for a roommate, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I told you Kud was looking for a roommate, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「何だ、未だに見つからないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, you guys are still at it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, you guys are still at it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それともあれか？　キミとクドリャフカ君の二人でアツアツ同棲生活でも送りたいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Or could it be? You and Kudryavka-kun want to shack up together?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Or could it be? You and Kudryavka-kun want to shack up together?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それはちと難しいが、どうしてもというなら尽力してやらんでもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That might be a bit difficult, but I'll help you out if you insist.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That might be a bit difficult, but I'll help you out if you insist.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、誰もそんなこと言ってないからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, nobody said anything like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, nobody said anything like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「来ヶ谷さんは今どちらにお住まいですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Where are you living, Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Where are you living, Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ん？　旧館の個室だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hm? A single room in the old dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hm? A single room in the old dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「きゅ、旧館だったのですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Th-the old dorm!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Th-the old dorm!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何でそこで驚くのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why the surprise?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why the surprise?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私、今まで女子寮で来ヶ谷さんを一度も見かけたことがありません…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I haven't seen her in the dorm even once until now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I haven't seen her in the dorm even once until now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうか？　私はキミのことをよく見かけるがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Really? I see you quite a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Really? I see you quite a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「胸はまあ成長途中だが、なかなか将来有望な体のラインをしている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Your breasts are still growing. Your body has definite potential.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Your breasts are still growing. Your body has definite potential.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「あと、この間はおへそのちかくに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The other day I noticed that around her bellybutton she has...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The other day I noticed that around her bellybutton she has...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わあああああっ！　わああああああっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Waaaaa! Waaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Waaaaa! Waaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが来ヶ谷さんの口を塞ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud whisked her hands over Kurugaya-san's mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud whisked her hands over Kurugaya-san's mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何を見てるのさ、来ヶ谷さんは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you see, Kurugaya-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you see, Kurugaya-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうも、このひとに頼むのは危険な気がしてきた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm starting to think that Kurugaya-san might be too dangerous for Kud to hang around...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm starting to think that Kurugaya-san might be too dangerous for Kud to hang around...

MESSAGE.JP: とまず事情を話し、交渉開始。
MESSAGE.EN: We explained Kurugaya-san Kud's situation in more detail.
MESSAGE.Translation: We explained Kurugaya-san Kud's situation in more detail.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どきどき…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Doki doki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Doki doki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 緊張を口に出して来ヶ谷さんの返答を待つクド。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud anxiously waited for Kurugaya-san to reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud anxiously waited for Kurugaya-san to reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…これは理樹君の提案か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Was this your idea, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Was this your idea, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　うん、そうだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Yeah, it was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Yeah, it was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ちょっとこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Come with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Come with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんに首根っこを捕まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She grabbed me by the neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She grabbed me by the neck.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「少年、キサマ…私を悶死させる気か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, are you attempting to torture me to death?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, are you attempting to torture me to death?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「も、悶死って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Torture you to death...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Torture you to death...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ルームメイトということはだ、寝食を共に過ごすと言う事だろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Living with her means that I have to eat with her and sleep with her, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Living with her means that I have to eat with her and sleep with her, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: らり、とクドのほうに目をやる。
MESSAGE.EN: She glanced over at Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She glanced over at Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…あんな娘が夜、すぐ近くで寝てたら私はどうすればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...What am I supposed to do when a cute girl like her is sleeping right next to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...What am I supposed to do when a cute girl like her is sleeping right next to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやどうもしなければいいじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have to do anything, I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have to do anything, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別に、自然にしてればいいと思うし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just act normal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just act normal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「やっちゃっていいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Can I do her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Can I do her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ダメに決まってるでしょうがっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course not!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course not!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「風呂上がりに上気した顔で『いいお湯でした』なんて状況でだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She gets out of the bath a little dizzy and says, ❛The water felt so good❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She gets out of the bath a little dizzy and says, ❛The water felt so good❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「パジャマでベッドに座ってもみろ。余裕で押し倒すぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then she sits down on the bed in her pajamas. I'd definitely push her down onto the bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then she sits down on the bed in her pajamas. I'd definitely push her down onto the bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「全然それ自然じゃないからっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not normal!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not normal!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「私にとっては全然たる自然だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, that's normal for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, that's normal for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが個室に割り当てられている理由が、なんとなくわかった気がした…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Now I understand why they gave her a single room...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Now I understand why they gave her a single room...

MESSAGE.JP: 険だ。とにかくこの人は危険だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Dangerous. She's totally dangerous.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dangerous. She's totally dangerous.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、ごめん、やっぱ他のひと当たってみるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, sorry. We'll find someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, sorry. We'll find someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむうむ、そうしてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, that's probably for the best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, that's probably for the best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「え、なんでですかっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ehh, why is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ehh, why is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三枝さんはどうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事をしてから僕はふと疑問を抱いて口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: As I replied, a question popped up in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I replied, a question popped up in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三枝さんのクラスどこだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you know what class she's in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you know what class she's in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ええと、どちらでしたでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's see, which could it have been?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's see, which could it have been?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は首をひねった。
MESSAGE.EN: I pondered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pondered.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえば知らないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that I think about it, I have no idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that I think about it, I have no idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 簿を職員室で調べればいいのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Will I have to go check the students' name list at the faculty office?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will I have to go check the students' name list at the faculty office?

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ヒドイなぁ、理樹くん。私のクラスぐらい覚えてよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You're horrible, Riki-kun. You don't even know what class I'm in～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You're horrible, Riki-kun. You don't even know what class I'm in～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「覚えるもなにも、いつも唐突に現れては消えるくせに…とと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you always suddenly appear and disappear so... What??❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you always suddenly appear and disappear so... What??❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わぁ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wah!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wah!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: つのまにか三枝さんがクドの背後に立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before we had noticed, Saigusa-san was standing behind Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before we had noticed, Saigusa-san was standing behind Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やは、理樹くんにクド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yaha, Riki-kun and Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yaha, Riki-kun and Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こ、こんにちは、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝He, hello, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝He, hello, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当いつも唐突だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You always appear out of nowhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You always appear out of nowhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「気配を消すぐらいお手の物、お手の物」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Concealing my presence is my forte～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Concealing my presence is my forte～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「消してどうするのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do you need to do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do you need to do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「…こうして忍び寄って…ていっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...To sneak up on her and... there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...To sneak up on her and... there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはいきなりクドの首筋に手刀をたたき込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san smacked Kud's neck with the side of her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san smacked Kud's neck with the side of her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わ、わふ～、い、痛いじゃないですか、三枝さん～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu～. That hurt, Saigusa-san～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu～. That hurt, Saigusa-san～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは三枝さんに抗議した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud raised her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud raised her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ごめんごめん。気絶させたくなっちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Sorry, sorry. I was trying to make you faint.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Sorry, sorry. I was trying to make you faint.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「行動に脈絡ゼロだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That doesn't make any sense.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That doesn't make any sense.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ほら、こー、なんというか、しっぽ振ってる犬を見るとね、ついね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Look, well, you know, when I see a dog wagging its tail I want to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Look, well, you know, when I see a dog wagging its tail I want to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「つい…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You want to what...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You want to what...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「首筋にぺしって当てるとくたーっ、となるのが見たくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I want to smack it on the neck and watch it go weak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I want to smack it on the neck and watch it go weak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…噛みつかれても知らないよそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What if you get bitten...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What if you get bitten...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「クド公は噛みつかないもんね～？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Little Kud won't do that, right～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Little Kud won't do that, right～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはクドの頭の上に手を置いてぐりぐり回している。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san put her hands on Kud's head and started spinning her around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san put her hands on Kud's head and started spinning her around.

MESSAGE.JP: 当に犬と同じ扱いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She really does treat her like a dog.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really does treat her like a dog.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから『クド公』なんて呼んでるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why you call her ❛Little Kud❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why you call her ❛Little Kud❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「だって犬じゃん。ねぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝She's a doggie, isn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝She's a doggie, isn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ほらーわふわふしてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Just look at her go wafu wafu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Just look at her go wafu wafu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ねぇクド公？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Right, Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Right, Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふ～わふ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～ wafu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～ wafu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らごらんなさい、と言う視線の三枝さんに僕はため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san shot me a look of pride as if to say ❛See, I'm not wrong.❜ All I could do was sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san shot me a look of pride as if to say ❛See, I'm not wrong.❜ All I could do was sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは目を回してるだけだってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, she's just dizzy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, she's just dizzy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ありゃ。そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅーと背後から抱きつきながら三枝さんが言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san said, hugging her from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san said, hugging her from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「それで、私になんか用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, you guys wanted to tell me something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, you guys wanted to tell me something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつ分ぐらい、三枝さんの背が高いせいで、のしかかられているクドはふらふらしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was a bit wobbly in the legs because Saigusa-san, who is a head taller than her, was leaning on her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was a bit wobbly in the legs because Saigusa-san, who is a head taller than her, was leaning on her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドがルームメイトを捜してるのは知ってるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess you know that Kud's looking for a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess you know that Kud's looking for a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あぁ。まだ見つかってないんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah. She hasn't found one yet, has she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah. She hasn't found one yet, has she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…三枝さんはお一人でしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I was wondering if you live in a single room, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I was wondering if you live in a single room, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはしばらくうなったまま答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't try to answer but just groaned instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't try to answer but just groaned instead.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あの？」
三枝@「私は違うよ。三人部屋の一人だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I don't. I live alone in a room for three.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I don't. I live alone in a room for three.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の間は何だったのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Why the pause before she replied?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why the pause before she replied?

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ちなみに新館のほうだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝My room is in the new dorm, by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝My room is in the new dorm, by the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあダメか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, you can't be her roommate, right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, you can't be her roommate, right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そうでもないよ。私が新館から移動すればいいんだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yes, I can. There won't be a problem if I just move out of the new dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yes, I can. There won't be a problem if I just move out of the new dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would that be okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would that be okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「私でよければ、だけどね～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Sure, as long as she doesn't mind～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Sure, as long as she doesn't mind～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは再びクドの頭の上に手を置いてぐるぐる回し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She resumed spinning Kud around by the head again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She resumed spinning Kud around by the head again.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あははははは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ahahahahahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ahahahahahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふ～っ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「単にオモチャになってるだけのよーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Won't she just become a plaything for you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Won't she just become a plaything for you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドにとっていい組み合わせの相手なのだろうか？　三枝さんは。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm beginning to wonder if Saigusa-san will be a good partner for Kud, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm beginning to wonder if Saigusa-san will be a good partner for Kud, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 々心配だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm a little worried.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm a little worried.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やはは。そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yahaha. You think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yahaha. You think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだってば。目を回してるし、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course. Look, her eyes are spinning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course. Look, her eyes are spinning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…め、めがまわりまふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I-I'm feeling dizzy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I-I'm feeling dizzy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: らふらしながらクドが答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She replied, standing unsteadily.
MESSAGE.Translation: She replied, standing unsteadily.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「一応荷物整理とかしておくね。まぁ、でも他のひとに決まったら教えてほしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'll start getting ready for the move, then. Well, let me know if you pick someone else instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'll start getting ready for the move, then. Well, let me know if you pick someone else instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yup, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yup, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「クド公もよろしく～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Little Kud, please take care of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Little Kud, please take care of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: をひらひらさせながら三枝さんは教室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san sailed out of the room fluttering her arms as if she were a floating butterfly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san sailed out of the room fluttering her arms as if she were a floating butterfly.

MESSAGE.JP: 分の教室へ戻ったのだろう、と見送りながら僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: She must be returning to her own classroom, I thought as I saw her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must be returning to her own classroom, I thought as I saw her off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、無難なところで…西園さんから順繰りにしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's start by asking Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's start by asking Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まずは話をしてみて感触を探るのがいいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's chat with her and see what she's like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's chat with her and see what she's like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、そうですねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, that's a good idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, that's a good idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは廊下側の席だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san's desk is on the corridor side of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san's desk is on the corridor side of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は立ち上がり、クドを連れて近づいていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and approached her desk with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and approached her desk with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…はい、なんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, how can I help you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, how can I help you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が呼びかけると、西園さんは振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around as I called to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around as I called to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーと、クドのことなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's talk about Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's talk about Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ルームメイトを捜しているんだけど…知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's looking for a roommate... did you know that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's looking for a roommate... did you know that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい、知ってますが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I did, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I did, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いかけた西園さんは言葉の途中で気がついたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to realize something in mid-sentence.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to realize something in mid-sentence.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わたしが候補者ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Am I a candidate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Am I a candidate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。何人かに当たってみてオーケーが出たひとに、と思ってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. We'd like you to be her roommate if that's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. We'd like you to be her roommate if that's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕の隣でこくこくと頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was eagerly nodding beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was eagerly nodding beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんは旧館だっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, you live in the old dorm, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, you live in the old dorm, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ええ、旧館です。能美さんのお部屋からも近いですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I do. My room's not too far from yours, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I do. My room's not too far from yours, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなの？　クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that true, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that true, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えーと、ちょっと待ってくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, hang on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, hang on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはスカートのポケットから紙切れを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced a sheet of paper from her skirt pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced a sheet of paper from her skirt pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「寮の旧館の地図です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A map of the old dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A map of the old dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れはどうやらクドの手書きの地図だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like she'd drawn the map herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like she'd drawn the map herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 角形が数列ずつ並んでいて、あちこち書き込みがしてある。
MESSAGE.EN: Rectangular rooms were numbered and lined up in rows, and notes were scribbled on the paper here and there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rectangular rooms were numbered and lined up in rows, and notes were scribbled on the paper here and there.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「西園さんはどこでしたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Where's your room, Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Where's your room, Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは黙って地図の一遍を人差し指でトン、と突いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a word, Nishizono-san indicated a spot on the map with her finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a word, Nishizono-san indicated a spot on the map with her finger.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、ここですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, over here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, over here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「同じ階だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The same floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The same floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは今度は胸ポケットから小さな鉛筆を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud produced a small pencil from her chest pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud produced a small pencil from her chest pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: して地図のその場所に、『西園さん』と書き込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She then wrote down ❛Nishizono-san❜ where she had pointed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then wrote down ❛Nishizono-san❜ where she had pointed.

MESSAGE.JP: の近くに『たまごごはん』と書いてあるのが激しく謎だったがそれは追求せずクドに訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: I glimpsed a note saying ❛egg rice❜ near that point and wondered what it could possibly mean, but decided to ignore it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glimpsed a note saying ❛egg rice❜ near that point and wondered what it could possibly mean, but decided to ignore it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「近いなら引っ越しも楽だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Moving your things would be easy since the two rooms are close to one another.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Moving your things would be easy since the two rooms are close to one another.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「能美さんのお部屋は端っこですが、暑いですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You have a window room, right? Isn't it hot, Noumi-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You have a window room, right? Isn't it hot, Noumi-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえ、そんなことはないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, not at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, not at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはふるふると首を振って否定した。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head emphatically.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head emphatically.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「端ですけど窓は南しかないんですよ。でも、暑くはないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I do have a window room, but it's facing south, so it's not hot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I do have a window room, but it's facing south, so it's not hot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「暑いのは苦手？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you dislike hot weather?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you dislike hot weather?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そうですね、暑いのはちょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, heat is a little...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, heat is a little...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「旧館のほうは、風通りが悪い部屋とそうでない部屋の差が激しくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In the old dorm, how airy it is completely depends on where your room is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In the old dorm, how airy it is completely depends on where your room is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで改築工事したんだっけか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that why they were remodeling the building?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that why they were remodeling the building?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そうなりますね。あと雨漏りもありましたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, it is. And there were some leaks in the ceiling too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, it is. And there were some leaks in the ceiling too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「でも、わたしでいいんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But are you fine with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But are you fine with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お願いできるんでしたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, if you don't mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, if you don't mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはにこにこと無邪気に笑顔で答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She replied back, a bright smile on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She replied back, a bright smile on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ちょっと部屋に荷物が多いので…本とかですけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have lots of things in my room... I mean, a lot of books.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have lots of things in my room... I mean, a lot of books.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「お部屋が狭くなっちゃうかもしれませんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They might make your room more cramped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They might make your room more cramped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでもかまわないですか？　と西園さんが訊ねてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Are you okay with that, asked Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Are you okay with that, asked Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「全然かまわないです～。私は荷物そんなにないですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No problem. I haven't that many things in my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No problem. I haven't that many things in my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どんな本でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What kind of books by the way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What kind of books by the way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わたしは乱読ですので雑多ですが…最近ではフェルマーの最終定理を扱った本を読みました。他には…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I read all kinds of books... recently, I've been reading about Fermat's last theorem. I also read...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I read all kinds of books... recently, I've been reading about Fermat's last theorem. I also read...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの口からは、あまり聞いたことのない単語が流れるように出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: A bunch of words we weren't familiar with came flooding out from her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: A bunch of words we weren't familiar with came flooding out from her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、お薦めの本を聞いてるわけじゃないんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, Nishizono-san, it's not like Kud asked you for recommendations.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, Nishizono-san, it's not like Kud asked you for recommendations.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「面白いですよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Isn't that interesting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Isn't that interesting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…面白くないかもしれません」
