MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No, it might be boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No, it might be boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の顔を見て西園さんは訂正した。
MESSAGE.EN: She corrected her sentence after one look at my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She corrected her sentence after one look at my face.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「本の匂いは好きですよー。だから大丈夫ですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I like the smell of books, so that's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I like the smell of books, so that's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは微妙にずれたレスポンスだと思ったが、クドは本当にそう思っているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought her reply was a little out of place, but it seemed to have come from her heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought her reply was a little out of place, but it seemed to have come from her heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…能美さんが本棚のスペースのこと了承していただけるんでしたらかまいません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...There's no problem with sharing a room if Noumi-san provides enough space for my books.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...There's no problem with sharing a room if Noumi-san provides enough space for my books.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そろそろ次の授業の予習をしたいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm sorry, but I need to get ready for my next class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm sorry, but I need to get ready for my next class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは申し訳なさそうに言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said apologetically.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said apologetically.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、じゃあ返事はあとでいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we'll let you know later, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we'll let you know later, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「構いませんよ。決まったら教えてくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Okay. Please keep me informed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Okay. Please keep me informed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、席に戻ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, let's get back to our desks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, let's get back to our desks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、はい、わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, yes, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お返事はまた後日にします、西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll give you an answer later, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll give you an answer later, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい、わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I've got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I've got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの返事を聞いて、僕とクドは自分の席に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: After hearing her answer, each of us headed back to our own desks.
MESSAGE.Translation: After hearing her answer, each of us headed back to our own desks.

MESSAGE.JP: の休み時間になると、今度は学食問題の解決のためにまた厨房に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: Another break came, and Rin and I headed to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another break came, and Rin and I headed to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 介たちも居るはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and the rest should already be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and the rest should already be there.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、走るぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, run!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, run!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O, okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しい日だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: What a busy day...
MESSAGE.Translation: What a busy day...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「昼はメニューがあるわけだけどさ…すべての注文に対応しなきゃいけないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's various items on the lunch menu... Are we supposed to make them all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's various items on the lunch menu... Are we supposed to make them all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「当然だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いや、待て、冗談じゃねぇ、ぜんぶ作れってのかよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No way, you're kidding! We're gonna make all that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No way, you're kidding! We're gonna make all that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「無理か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Can't we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Can't we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「無理だろうねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「緊急事態なんだから、メニューなんか無視すればいいだろう。やむをえまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I think we'd better ignore those menus because this is an emergency. There's nothing we can do about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I think we'd better ignore those menus because this is an emergency. There's nothing we can do about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それも可哀想だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's too bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's too bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は考え込んだまま黙りこくってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She fell silent, struggling to come up with a good idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fell silent, struggling to come up with a good idea.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、昼飯が一種類なんて言われた日にゃあ、暴れたくもなるが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, if I were told there's only one choice for lunch, I'd definitely get mad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, if I were told there's only one choice for lunch, I'd definitely get mad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「不満の声は大きいだろうねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it might cause a lot of dissatisfaction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it might cause a lot of dissatisfaction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…ちょっと待ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait just a sec.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait just a sec.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が駆け足で、厨房を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: She ran out of the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ran out of the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: 想通り、ポケットの携帯が震える。
MESSAGE.EN: As I expected, my cellphone vibrated in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I expected, my cellphone vibrated in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしたらいい』
MESSAGE.EN: [What should we do?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [What should we do?]

MESSAGE.JP: んな（というか真人以外）にはばればれなんだろうな、と思いつつ、その場で返事を打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I suspected everybody (except Masato) knew why she had gone, I messaged back in front of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I suspected everybody (except Masato) knew why she had gone, I messaged back in front of them.

MESSAGE.JP: せめて二種類に定食を分ければ？』と提案した。
MESSAGE.EN: [Why don't we try serving at least two different meals?], I typed.
MESSAGE.Translation: [Why don't we try serving at least two different meals?], I typed.

MESSAGE.JP: がぱたぱたと走って戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She rushed back to the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: She rushed back to the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いいか、おまえら、よく聞けっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Now you guys, listen up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Now you guys, listen up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「せめて二種類に定食を分ければ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why don't we try serving at least two different meals?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why don't we try serving at least two different meals?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「意気込んできたわりには、穏やかな提案だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wow, you seem all fired up even though that's a pretty normal idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wow, you seem all fired up even though that's a pretty normal idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだな、それが妥当なところだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, that's a reasonable plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, that's a reasonable plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介がそう同意した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke agreed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke agreed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「メニューの内容は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are we gonna make?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are we gonna make?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let me see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let me see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が大きな冷蔵庫を開いて覗きながら考える。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking inside the big fridge, she pondered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking inside the big fridge, she pondered.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ひとつは揚げ物にしようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's make some fried food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's make some fried food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、ミックスフライだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, let's make a fried combo plate, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, let's make a fried combo plate, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「内訳は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What will we fry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What will we fry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「コロッケ、エビフライ、一口カツ、千切りキャベツ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Croquettes, shrimp, pork. And I think we should add shredded cabbage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Croquettes, shrimp, pork. And I think we should add shredded cabbage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「エビフライは２尾な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Two shrimp for each serving.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Two shrimp for each serving.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それに、ご飯、みそ汁を足してミックスフライ定食のできあがりか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And adding rice and miso soup as side dishes gives us a lunch set.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And adding rice and miso soup as side dishes gives us a lunch set.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もうひとつは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We need one more menu item.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We need one more menu item.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「片方があぶらっこいから、軽いのがいいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The first one's oily, so we should make this one a light meal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The first one's oily, so we should make this one a light meal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おにぎり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Onigiri.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Onigiri.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど、女の子らしくていいんじゃない？　おかずはどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. That's a typically girlish item. And for a side dish?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. That's a typically girlish item. And for a side dish?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「小さなカップに入ったゼリー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A small cup of jelly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A small cup of jelly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そりゃおやつだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't that a snack...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't that a snack...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、横に添えておけば色どりになっていいんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But wouldn't it make the lunch colorful?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But wouldn't it make the lunch colorful?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それにみそ汁つけておけばＯＫだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And it'd be okay to add a bowl of miso soup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And it'd be okay to add a bowl of miso soup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後は簡単にカレーができそうだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It seems we could make curry easily enough as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It seems we could make curry easily enough as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が段ボールを探り当てて言う。
MESSAGE.EN: He'd found a cardboard package.
MESSAGE.Translation: He'd found a cardboard package.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「レトルトか…非常時のものだろうが、今がまさにその時か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ready-made curry... Something to be used in times of emergency; like today, I suppose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ready-made curry... Something to be used in times of emergency; like today, I suppose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうするんだ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What do you think, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What do you think, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…カレーはうまいからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm... Curry's yummy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm... Curry's yummy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よし、カレーもいれる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right, curry's in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right, curry's in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、ミックスフライ定食、おにぎり定食、カレーの三種類だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now we have the fried combo plate and onigiri meals, and curry rice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now we have the fried combo plate and onigiri meals, and curry rice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「オーケー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「異論はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No objections.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No objections.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sounds good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sounds good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ…みんなお昼休みもよろしく頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right... Let's do it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right... Let's do it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の休み時間も、ルームメイトを探しにクドと歩いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: During the next break I walked around with Kud in search of a roommate again.
MESSAGE.Translation: During the next break I walked around with Kud in search of a roommate again.

MESSAGE.JP: 憩として、自動販売機の飲み物を買うことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: For a short breather, we went to the vending machine to buy some drinks.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a short breather, we went to the vending machine to buy some drinks.

MESSAGE.JP: 服のポケットから財布を取り出し、中身を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out my wallet and peered inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out my wallet and peered inside.

MESSAGE.JP: わ。小銭がない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yikes. I don't have any small change...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yikes. I don't have any small change...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あれ、直枝さん、どうされましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, Naoe-san, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, Naoe-san, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、ん、いやちょっとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, hm, nothing much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, hm, nothing much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小銭がたまたまなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just don't have any change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just don't have any change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うと、クドはスカートのポケットから財布を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and produced her coin purse from her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and produced her coin purse from her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: い紺色の小さながま口財布だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a small mazarine wallet.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a small mazarine wallet.

MESSAGE.JP: の子の財布にしては違和感のある色だなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder why she'd bought it. It wasn't very girly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder why she'd bought it. It wasn't very girly.

MESSAGE.JP: ちん、とそれを開けると、クドは硬貨をひとつ、取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened it and fished out a coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened it and fished out a coin.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今日は五百円玉がお財布にあるんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I have a 500 yen coin today～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I have a 500 yen coin today～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは両手の人差し指で五百円玉を挟んで、びしっと示した。
MESSAGE.EN: She held onto it proudly with both hands as she showed it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held onto it proudly with both hands as she showed it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「五百円玉があるお財布はとてもりっちですよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A wallet with 500 yen coins looks rich, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A wallet with 500 yen coins looks rich, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 差し指の間の硬貨をうりうり動かしてるクドは嬉しそうに言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, turning the 500 yen coin between her thumbs and first fingers to show it off.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, turning the 500 yen coin between her thumbs and first fingers to show it off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I guess so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I guess so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は苦笑した。でもまぁ、気持ちはわからなくはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a wry smile, but I could understand her feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a wry smile, but I could understand her feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「というわけで、あい・うぃる・ぷれぜんと・ざ・じゅーすとぅゆ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, ai wiru purezento za ju-su too yu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, ai wiru purezento za ju-su too yu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがコインを入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She inserted the coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She inserted the coin.

MESSAGE.JP: ッ！と、自動販売機の赤いランプが点った。
MESSAGE.EN: All the buttons on the vending machine blinked on.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the buttons on the vending machine blinked on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いいの？　クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you sure, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you sure, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうぞどうぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, help yourself!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, help yourself!❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり日本語に戻ってるし、クド。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey Kud, you spoke Japanese just then.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey Kud, you spoke Japanese just then.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、カフェオレ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, I'll take cafe au lait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, I'll take cafe au lait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あい・こぴ～、かふぇ・お・れ・りりーす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ai kopi～, kafe o re riri-su.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ai kopi～, kafe o re riri-su.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かしな台詞を言いながらクドは自販機のボタンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: With that rather odd line, she pushed a button.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that rather odd line, she pushed a button.

MESSAGE.JP: 。がたん。
MESSAGE.EN: A carton clattered down to the outlet.
MESSAGE.Translation: A carton clattered down to the outlet.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さん、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here you are, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here you are, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のために、クドがストローを刺して渡してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She poked a straw into the coffee and handed it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She poked a straw into the coffee and handed it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私はどうしようかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What should I get...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What should I get...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーんうーん、とクドは迷っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't able to make a quick decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't able to make a quick decision.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これにします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll have this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll have this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 。がたん。
MESSAGE.EN: She pushed a button.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pushed a button.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どうして目をつむって選ぶの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why did you choose with your eyes closed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why did you choose with your eyes closed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は不思議に思って尋ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed strange to me, so I asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed strange to me, so I asked.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…深い意味はないですよ、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...No particular reason, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...No particular reason, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、なんとなく時々選択を何かに委ねたくなりませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But isn't it exciting to let fate decide sometimes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But isn't it exciting to let fate decide sometimes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「学食のメニューとか。この場合は偶然というか必然というか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The cafeteria menu, for example. I don't know whether it's chance or destiny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The cafeteria menu, for example. I don't know whether it's chance or destiny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは左目で僕をちらりと見ながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said looking at me with her left eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said looking at me with her left eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「目を閉じたままで食券を買うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You buy a food ticket with your eyes closed, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You buy a food ticket with your eyes closed, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうです。なかなかスリリングな食生活が堪能できます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. You can enjoy a thrilling meal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. You can enjoy a thrilling meal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「例えば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For example?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For example?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「例えば…そうですね、$K115うどん$K0そばとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝An example... Well, something like $K115udon$K0-soba.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝An example... Well, something like $K115udon$K0-soba.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うどんそば!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Udon-soba!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Udon-soba!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うどんとそばが一緒に入っているのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Udon and soba mixed together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Udon and soba mixed together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それは…なんというか…そう、ハイブリッドなメニューだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's... like... Yeah, it's like a hybrid menu, I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's... like... Yeah, it's like a hybrid menu, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なかなか美味しかったですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「れっつちゃれんじ、なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rettsu tyarenji!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rettsu tyarenji!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あはは。機会があったらね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ahaha. If I get the chance...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ahaha. If I get the chance...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく僕たちは紙パックにストローを刺してジュースを飲んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For a while we enjoyed our soft drinks.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a while we enjoyed our soft drinks.

MESSAGE.JP: らり、とクドを見ると、紙パックを両手で持ったまま、ちうちう音を立てている。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced over at Kud. She was holding her juice carton with both hands and sucking noisily on the straw.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced over at Kud. She was holding her juice carton with both hands and sucking noisily on the straw.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭を見渡せる渡り廊下に、日の光が差し込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sunlight was pouring into the corridor overlooking the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sunlight was pouring into the corridor overlooking the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: らきらとクドの亜麻色をした髪を照らしている。
MESSAGE.EN: And it was also shining on Kud's flaxen hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: And it was also shining on Kud's flaxen hair.

MESSAGE.JP: はなんとはなしに、クドの髪の毛を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: For no particular reason, I found myself gazing at her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: For no particular reason, I found myself gazing at her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、あ、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, ah, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, ah, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はストローから口を離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the straw from my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the straw from my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: れから紙パックをぽん、とゴミ箱に放る。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I tossed the carton into a trash can.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I tossed the carton into a trash can.

MESSAGE.JP: 突にクドが僕を見上げてきたので、照れ隠しみたいになってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was covering my embarrassment after being suddenly caught staring at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was covering my embarrassment after being suddenly caught staring at her.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうかしましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is something the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is something the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、えーと、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの上背は全然ないから、僕は彼女の頭――髪の毛を見下ろしている形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: She's so short that I can see her hair from the top of her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's so short that I can see her hair from the top of her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…いえ、その。何かぼーっとしてましたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...No, um. You seemed to be focused on something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...No, um. You seemed to be focused on something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「美味しくなかったですか？　カフェオレ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Was the cafe au lait bad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Was the cafe au lait bad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん、そうじゃないよ、ただ、なんとなく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it wasn't... I was just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it wasn't... I was just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なんとなく？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Just what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Just what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの髪の毛を見ていた、なんて答えたら少し恥ずかしい気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It would've been a little too embarrassing to tell Kud I'd been staring at her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would've been a little too embarrassing to tell Kud I'd been staring at her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: から僕は黙って曖昧な笑顔を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: So I said nothing, showing a faint smile instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I said nothing, showing a faint smile instead.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ふぉーれふふぁー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Fo-refafi-?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Fo-refafi-?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーですか？　とクドは飲みながら頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Oh really?❜, she nodded drinking her juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Oh really?❜, she nodded drinking her juice.

MESSAGE.JP: 得してくれたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to understand.

MESSAGE.JP: うしても聞きたい疑問ではなかったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't like she really wanted to know what I was thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't like she really wanted to know what I was thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは再び中庭を見ながら紙パックの中身を飲んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: So she continued drinking her juice, watching the view of the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: So she continued drinking her juice, watching the view of the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ん…アレ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hm... Oh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hm... Oh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは唇からストローを離した。
MESSAGE.EN: And she stopped drinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she stopped drinking.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうかしたの、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's the matter, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's the matter, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あそこのひと、何をしてるんでしょうねぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What do you think she's doing over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What do you think she's doing over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが指し示す中庭のその先に、ひとりの女の子が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at where she pointed; a girl was standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at where she pointed; a girl was standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふつうの…生徒みたいに思えるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It looks like... she's just a normal student.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It looks like... she's just a normal student.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段おかしいところはない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing strange about her.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing strange about her.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうなんですけど…でも、ほら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, it does... But, look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, it does... But, look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の子は見ていると不意に数歩だけ歩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl took a few steps, unaware that she was being watched.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl took a few steps, unaware that she was being watched.

MESSAGE.JP: のまままた動かなくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「動いてます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She's moving.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She's moving.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りゃ動くだろう、生きてるんだから、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course she moves, she's alive after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course she moves, she's alive after all.

MESSAGE.JP: が、クドが言いたいのはそういうことではないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But that wasn't what she wanted to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But that wasn't what she wanted to say.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ふぅむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Humm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Humm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さん、ちょっと持っててください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-san, could you wait here a minute?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-san, could you wait here a minute?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいけど、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドから飲みかけの紙パックを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me her unfinished juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me her unfinished juice.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはパタパタと上靴を鳴らしながら彼女のほうへ向かっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud hurried toward the girl, walking pitter-patter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud hurried toward the girl, walking pitter-patter.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…？　まさか、何をしてるのか訊きにいったのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...? Is she heading over to ask the girl what she's doing...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...? Is she heading over to ask the girl what she's doing...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 奇心旺盛なのも困ったものだなぁ、と僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking about her unending curiosity made me smile wryly again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking about her unending curiosity made me smile wryly again.

MESSAGE.JP: ドはいつもの身振り手振りで話をしているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As always, Kud was gesturing wildly as she spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: As always, Kud was gesturing wildly as she spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 言三言交わしたあと、クドは頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: After they exchanged a few words, Kud nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: After they exchanged a few words, Kud nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「すみません、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sorry it took long, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sorry it took long, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドがまたパタパタと上靴を鳴らして戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She hurried back to me with her little steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hurried back to me with her little steps.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何訊いてたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「面白いもの、踏めますか、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I asked if she was stepping on something interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I asked if she was stepping on something interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…踏む？　踏むって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Step? Stepping on what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Step? Stepping on what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「影踏みです、影踏み。影踏みしてるのかなーと、思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The shadow stepping game. I thought she was playing that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The shadow stepping game. I thought she was playing that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは自分の影を示しながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said pointing at her own shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said pointing at her own shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…昼間から影踏み遊びをしてるって変な人だよ、それは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She'd be quite the weird one to be spending her day playing the shadow stepping game, I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She'd be quite the weird one to be spending her day playing the shadow stepping game, I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ですかー…それはそれで風流だと思うんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You do...? I think it's quite elegant and attractive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You do...? I think it's quite elegant and attractive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 流って…。
MESSAGE.EN: Elegant and attractive... are you sure?
MESSAGE.Translation: Elegant and attractive... are you sure?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「返事はなんて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did she say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did she say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『影踏みなんかしてない』ってお答えでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝❛Of course I'm not!❜ she said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝❛Of course I'm not!❜ she said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃそうだろうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thought as much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thought as much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あはは。あ、直枝さん、どうもです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ahaha. Ah, Naoe-san, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ahaha. Ah, Naoe-san, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは僕から紙パックを受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed back her juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed back her juice.

MESSAGE.JP: して再びちうー、と中身を飲んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She began drinking it again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began drinking it again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ところで、クド。それ、美味しい…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...By the way, Kud. How is it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...By the way, Kud. How is it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…んぐ、ん、不思議な味です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Ngu, hm, it has a strange flavor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Ngu, hm, it has a strange flavor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: パックにはティラミスジュース、と書いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: The writing on the carton said it was tiramisu juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: The writing on the carton said it was tiramisu juice.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なぜティラミス…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why tiramisu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why tiramisu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 動販売機には他にも怪しげなどろっとしていたり濃厚そうな名前のものが並んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at it, there was one strange drink after another listed on the vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at it, there was one strange drink after another listed on the vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なになに？　ストレンジ・ジュースウィークです、だって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What? A weird juice week?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What? A weird juice week?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は自動販売機に貼られたキャンペーンシールを読む。
MESSAGE.EN: I read the sticker on the vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I read the sticker on the vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「カフェオレはこのらいんなっぷでは異邦人（すとれんじゃー）ですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝In this lineup cafe au lait is the odd one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝In this lineup cafe au lait is the odd one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういう受け流し方以前にツッコむことがもっとあるような気がする…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think there are bigger issues here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think there are bigger issues here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 育館脇の自動販売機は、時々謎だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: The vending machine next to the gym is sometimes a mystery...
MESSAGE.Translation: The vending machine next to the gym is sometimes a mystery...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そろそろ行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's time we got back to the search.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's time we got back to the search.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これで一通り聞いて回ったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should ask around here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should ask around here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I suppose so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I suppose so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の前の広場にあるベンチに腰掛けたクドは思案顔だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She sat down on the bench in front of the girls' dorm with a thoughtful look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sat down on the bench in front of the girls' dorm with a thoughtful look.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうする、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どなたにもご迷惑じゃないでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I suppose my request would be a bother to anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I suppose my request would be a bother to anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ちょっと今更ではあるんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It may be a little late for that already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It may be a little late for that already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫だよ、みんなそんなに気にしないひとたちばっかりだ……と思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't worry, I'm sure they won't mind it... probably.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't worry, I'm sure they won't mind it... probably.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu-...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu-...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さんからみて、一番私に合ってそうなひとは誰でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Who do you think would be the best roommate for me, Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Who do you think would be the best roommate for me, Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は言われても、手応えがあったのは西園さんぐらいのものだし。
MESSAGE.EN: At the moment the only one who's given us a positive response is Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the moment the only one who's given us a positive response is Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり、西園さんかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess in the end it'd be Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess in the end it'd be Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、西園さんなら私もとてもうれしいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I'd be happy if she were my roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I'd be happy if she were my roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でも、やっぱりご迷惑をお掛けしてしまうのではないでしょうか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But I'm still wondering if my request would bother her～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But I'm still wondering if my request would bother her～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…まあ、直接聞いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm... Let's go ask her anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm... Let's go ask her anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu-...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu-...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 切れの悪いクドを連れて、西園さんを探す事にした。
MESSAGE.EN: She replied ambiguously. We began looking for Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She replied ambiguously. We began looking for Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭で、どこかへ向かう途中の西園さんを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: We found her in the courtyard. She seemed to be on her way somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: We found her in the courtyard. She seemed to be on her way somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 速クドがルームメイトについて話すと。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud asked her right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud asked her right away.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わかりました。では、そのように準備しましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Very well. I'll start the preparations, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Very well. I'll start the preparations, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 諾だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She kindly agreed to the offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kindly agreed to the offer.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、あの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ご迷惑ではないでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You don't have any problem with it, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You don't have any problem with it, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…迷惑ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はうぁっ、や、やっぱり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hauu, you do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hauu, you do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの反応をネガティブに受け取りまくっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud took Nishizono-san's reaction badly.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud took Nishizono-san's reaction badly.

MESSAGE.JP: かに、表情もあまり変わらない西園さんの心中は察しにくい。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't deny that it's hard to tell what Nishizono-san's thinking because she hardly changes her expression at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't deny that it's hard to tell what Nishizono-san's thinking because she hardly changes her expression at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…むしろわたしが迷惑かもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I myself might be a problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I myself might be a problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はうぅぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hauu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hauu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なにか二人の間に誤解があるような気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I suspect there's some kind of misunderstanding between the two girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I suspect there's some kind of misunderstanding between the two girls.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーとそれは、クドとルームメイトになるってことが迷惑ってことじゃないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's see, you don't have any problem with sharing a room with Kud, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's see, you don't have any problem with sharing a room with Kud, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…そうですよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Of course not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Of course not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、はあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ha, haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ha, haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…迷惑をかけてしまうのは、本です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's my books that that may be problematic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's my books that that may be problematic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「引っ越すとなると、蔵書も全て移動しなければなりませんから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If I move, I'll need to take all of them with me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If I move, I'll need to take all of them with me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「結構なスペースになってしまうかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And they'll take up a lot of space.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And they'll take up a lot of space.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、そ、そうだったのですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, I get it now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, I get it now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だってさ。どうするクド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So what do you want to do, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So what do you want to do, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それは全然かまわないです～。よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I really don't mind at all. It'll be a pleasure living with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I really don't mind at all. It'll be a pleasure living with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはぺこんと頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…ちなみにあんまり見ないほうがいい本もいっぱいありますよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...By the way, I have a lot of books you shouldn't read. Is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...By the way, I have a lot of books you shouldn't read. Is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ど、どんな本なんですかっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wha, what kind of books?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wha, what kind of books?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「興味があるならお見せしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you're interested, I'll show you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you're interested, I'll show you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、楽しみですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I'm looking forward to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I'm looking forward to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな本なんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what kind of book she's talking about...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what kind of book she's talking about...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず、本がいっぱいあるなら運ぶのは大変だね。手伝うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'll be a real pain to move that many books on your own. I'll help you out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'll be a real pain to move that many books on your own. I'll help you out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さんもありがとうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「都合の良い日に手伝うから、あとでクドに教えてあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let Kud know what day's convenient for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let Kud know what day's convenient for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わかりました。よろしくお願いします、能美さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Thanks for helping us, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Thanks for helping us, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「よろしく～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Me too～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Me too～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは西園さんの両手を握ってぶんぶんと上下に振った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud took hold of Nishizono-san's hands and shook them up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud took hold of Nishizono-san's hands and shook them up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: とで詳しい話をする約束を取り付けて、西園さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: After a promise to settle the details later, Nishizono-san left.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a promise to settle the details later, Nishizono-san left.

MESSAGE.JP: は言われても、手応えがあったのは三枝さんぐらいのものだし。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san is the only one who's given a positive response at the moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san is the only one who's given a positive response at the moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、三枝さんかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm. What about Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm. What about Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「三枝さんですか？　確かに頼んだらすぐおーけーしてくれそうですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san? She did seem ready to accept the offer straight away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Saigusa-san? She did seem ready to accept the offer straight away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でも、やっぱりご迷惑お掛けしてしまう気もしますけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But I hope that won't give her trouble after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But I hope that won't give her trouble after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…まあ、直接聞いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmmm... Let's go ask her at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm... Let's go ask her at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu-...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu-...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 切れの悪いクドを連れて、三枝さんを探す事にした。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered worriedly, and we started looking for Saigusa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered worriedly, and we started looking for Saigusa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーと、どこにいるのかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where is she...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where is she...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あはははは、おもちゃげっとーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ahahahahaha, I've got a toy!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ahahahahaha, I've got a toy!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu-!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu-!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: つける前にクドがゲットされていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san caught Kud before we could find her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san caught Kud before we could find her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、探してたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, we've been looking for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, we've been looking for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ん、私？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hm? Me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hm? Me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、クドのルームメイトなんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. We wanted to discuss Kud's room-sharing with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. We wanted to discuss Kud's room-sharing with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あ、決まったんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, did you decide?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, did you decide?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さーいーぐーさーさんにーおねーがいしまーすぅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Could... you... live... with... me... please... Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Could... you... live... with... me... please... Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 回りながらも懸命にお願いしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Though she was being spun around, she managed to ask desperately.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Though she was being spun around, she managed to ask desperately.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んー、そう？　おけおけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, is that it? Okay, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, is that it? Okay, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「一日三回はまわすけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But I'll give you a spin three times a day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But I'll give you a spin three times a day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わ、わふ～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ、三枝さんそれくらいに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well, I think you've spun her enough, Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well, I think you've spun her enough, Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: た、とクドの動きを止める。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped spinning Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped spinning Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「まあ、そんな感じだけど、クド公もそれでいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, something like that. Is that fine with you, Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, something like that. Is that fine with you, Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…三枝さんが、よろしければ、ぜひ、おねがいしまふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...If it's okay with you, I'd be really happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...If it's okay with you, I'd be really happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らふらしながらクドが答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She replied, standing unsteadily.
MESSAGE.Translation: She replied, standing unsteadily.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、決まりか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, the deal is done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, the deal is done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「引っ越しの手伝いとかあったら言ってよ、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you need help moving, let me know, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you need help moving, let me know, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕も手伝うからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll help you out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll help you out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「はいはい、そのときは宜しくね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yeah, yeah, I'll be counting on you then～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yeah, yeah, I'll be counting on you then～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「クド公もよろしく～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And I'll be happy to share a room with you, Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And I'll be happy to share a room with you, Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、はい、宜しくです、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uh, yes, me too, yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uh, yes, me too, yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しクドが不安そうだが、まぁなんとかなるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Though Kud was looking a little concerned, I figured everything would turn out all right.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though Kud was looking a little concerned, I figured everything would turn out all right.

MESSAGE.JP: はそんなことを考えながら二人が握手をするのを見守ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking that, I watched the two girls shake hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking that, I watched the two girls shake hands.

MESSAGE.JP: は言われても、いい反応をもらえた人は居なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, in the end no one had given a definite answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, in the end no one had given a definite answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「現状ではどうにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there isn't much we can do about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there isn't much we can do about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう少し探してみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's keep searching a little longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's keep searching a little longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でも、直枝さんのお昼休みをすべて占有してしまうのは申し訳ないので、ここからはひとりで探します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But, I can't just selfishly make you waste your entire lunch break on me, I'll continue searching on my own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But, I can't just selfishly make you waste your entire lunch break on me, I'll continue searching on my own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に気にしなくていいのに…と思ったが、クドは気をつかってか、僕が言葉を返す前に来た道を戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Never mind, I thought... But she was already returning the way we had come before I could answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Never mind, I thought... But she was already returning the way we had come before I could answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いよいよだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The time has come...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The time has come...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうでもいいけどよ、なんか役割分担とか決めなくてよかったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I guess it's a bit late, but shouldn't we decide who does what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I guess it's a bit late, but shouldn't we decide who does what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「注文が入ったら、全力で、差し出された盆に載っけていくだけさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All we have to do is take the orders and put the right food on the tray.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All we have to do is take the orders and put the right food on the tray.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いのか、そんな適当で…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if it will be that easy...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if it will be that easy...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ミッションスタートだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Mission Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Mission Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんとか乗り切ったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We managed to get through it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We managed to get through it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: やいやいや…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, no, no...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, no, no...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんとか乗り切ったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We managed to get through it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We managed to get through it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: り切ったのか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Did we...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did we...?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いい感じだったんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't you think it went pretty well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't you think it went pretty well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしらすごくないか？　定食屋開けるんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We were amazing, weren't we? We could open a small restaurant, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We were amazing, weren't we? We could open a small restaurant, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、できるかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, probably.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, probably.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「完璧だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It was perfect!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It was perfect!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、完璧だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は疲れて、ひとり外の空気を吸おうと表に出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped out to get some fresh air because I had gotten pretty tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped out to get some fresh air because I had gotten pretty tired.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I need a break...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I need a break...

MESSAGE.JP: ゃ、中庭にいくかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I think I want to check out the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I think I want to check out the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 休みもクドと一緒にルームメイト探しのため校内を歩いて回った。
MESSAGE.EN: At lunch time Kud and I walked around, searching for a roommate again.
MESSAGE.Translation: At lunch time Kud and I walked around, searching for a roommate again.

MESSAGE.JP: 独行動は危険だけど、ちゃんと約束は果たさなければいけないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: It was risky to act on my own, but I needed to fulfill my promise.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was risky to act on my own, but I needed to fulfill my promise.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭に出て少し歩くと、西園さんの姿を見つける。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon after I arrived in the courtyard, I found Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon after I arrived in the courtyard, I found Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんに会いにきたのは、昨日約束した、湿布を渡すためだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I came to give her a compress as I had promised yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I came to give her a compress as I had promised yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり、ここにいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I knew you'd be here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I knew you'd be here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 日と同じ場所、中庭のケヤキの木陰に西園さんはいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting under the shadow of the zelkova tree in the same way as yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting under the shadow of the zelkova tree in the same way as yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: えば、西園さんが誰かと一緒にご飯を食べている姿を見た覚えはない。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, I don't remember ever seeing her having lunch with anybody.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, I don't remember ever seeing her having lunch with anybody.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドのルームメイトの件、いきなりでごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're sorry if we surprised you earlier with the roomate thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're sorry if we surprised you earlier with the roomate thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…お気になさらずに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…見てのとおりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...As you can see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...As you can see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に日傘を広げて、西園さんは腰を下ろしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting next to her open parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting next to her open parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: にも中庭で弁当を広げている生徒はいるけれど、西園さんの周りに近づく人はいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although some students were eating lunch in the courtyard, there was no one around her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although some students were eating lunch in the courtyard, there was no one around her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん…そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, yeah... I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, yeah... I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が頷くと、西園さんはふるふると首を横に振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head when I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head when I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「今、直枝さんが来たので、ひとりになってしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm alone now that you're here, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm alone now that you're here, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 味がよくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't understand what she meant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't understand what she meant.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「何かご用ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What brings you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What brings you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「昨日は大丈夫だったかな、と思ったんだ。湿布を持ってくる約束だったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was worried about your injury, and I'd promised to give you a compress.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was worried about your injury, and I'd promised to give you a compress.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一晩経つと、あまり意味がないかもしれないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it's too late now since that was yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it's too late now since that was yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夜は女子寮に入れないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I'm not allowed to enter the girls' dorm at night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I'm not allowed to enter the girls' dorm at night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…そうですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かった表情を少し崩して、微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Her stony expression loosened up a bit into a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her stony expression loosened up a bit into a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あざになったりしなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haven't you got a bruise?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haven't you got a bruise?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこにぶつかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where did the ball hit you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where did the ball hit you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「セクハラです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's sexual harassment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's sexual harassment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「その質問は、セクシャルハラスメントですと言ったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I said your question is sexual harassment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I said your question is sexual harassment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「セクシャルハラスメント、とは性的いやがらせのことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sexual harassment is unwelcome attention of a sexual nature.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sexual harassment is unwelcome attention of a sexual nature.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「権力を利用して、立場の弱い相手に対して性的な行為を要求することを言います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Using one's power to proactively demand something of a sexual nature from someone in a weaker position, is what I'm trying to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Using one's power to proactively demand something of a sexual nature from someone in a weaker position, is what I'm trying to say.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…わたしの身体が目当てですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Is it my body that you're aiming for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Is it my body that you're aiming for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや、そんな訳じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N, no, of course not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N, no, of course not...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では、わたしには魅力がないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So, are you saying I'm unattractive?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So, are you saying I'm unattractive?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えー、い、いや。西園さんはとても素敵だと、お、思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, no, no. You're very attractive, I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, no, no. You're very attractive, I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: て、僕は何を言ってるんだー。
MESSAGE.EN: What on earth am I saying!
MESSAGE.Translation: What on earth am I saying!

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「というのは、冗談ですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そもそも…わたしと直枝さんでは、立場による権力の差はありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝First of all... you aren't in a position of power to threaten me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝First of all... you aren't in a position of power to threaten me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「同じ学生なのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We're both students.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We're both students.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「セクハラ、の定義には当てはまりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So this doesn't fit the definition of sexual harassment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So this doesn't fit the definition of sexual harassment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「安心してください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん…ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah... Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah... Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んかマイペースだなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm getting caught in her pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm getting caught in her pace.

MESSAGE.JP: と見ると、西園さんがお尻の辺りを手でさすっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look at her and noticed she was rubbing her behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look at her and noticed she was rubbing her behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 意識に手が行った、という風だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like an unconscious action.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like an unconscious action.

MESSAGE.JP: ボールがぶつかったのって、お尻だったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The ball had hit her on the behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The ball had hit her on the behind.

MESSAGE.JP: ち上がろうとしたか、膝をついたときにちょうど当たってしまったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It must've happened just as she was trying to get up or sit down.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must've happened just as she was trying to get up or sit down.

MESSAGE.JP: んだか、悪いことをしたなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt really bad about it now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt really bad about it now.

MESSAGE.JP: の打ったボールが、はるばる中庭まで飛んできて…この木の下に座っていた西園さんのお尻にぶつかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The ball that I hit came flying over here into the courtyard... and consequently hit Nishizono-san's butt, while she was sitting under that tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ball that I hit came flying over here into the courtyard... and consequently hit Nishizono-san's butt, while she was sitting under that tree.

MESSAGE.JP: の打率は決して高くない。ホームランとなれば、なおさらだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My batting average was bad, and I had even fewer home runs.
MESSAGE.Translation: My batting average was bad, and I had even fewer home runs.

MESSAGE.JP: の僕が特大の当たりを出して、そのボールがたまたま西園さんのお尻にぶつかる。
MESSAGE.EN: And though I managed to hit the ball into this wide open area, it somehow still hit Nishizono-san's butt square on.
MESSAGE.Translation: And though I managed to hit the ball into this wide open area, it somehow still hit Nishizono-san's butt square on.

MESSAGE.JP: ずいぶん低い確率に違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The odds of this happening were just way too low.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The odds of this happening were just way too low.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを考えていると、いつの間にか西園さんがこちらを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed that Nishizono-san was looking at me as I was considering all this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed that Nishizono-san was looking at me as I was considering all this.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「直枝さん、その視線はデリカシィに欠けます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, staring at me like that is impolite.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, staring at me like that is impolite.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、その…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, well... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, well... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 尻を見ていたわけじゃないんだけどね。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not like I was just leering at her backside.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not like I was just leering at her backside.

MESSAGE.JP: 室の救急箱から持ってきた湿布を手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave her a compress from the first aid kit I'd brought along.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave her a compress from the first aid kit I'd brought along.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「小さなことですけど、ちゃんと約束を守ってくれたんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That was just a small thing. But still, you still kept your promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That was just a small thing. But still, you still kept your promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これからはもっと周りに気をつけないとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We'll try to be more careful when we're playing baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We'll try to be more careful when we're playing baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「他のみんなにも言っておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll mention it to the other members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll mention it to the other members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「バウンドしたボールが当たっただけですので、大したことはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The ball simply bounced off, it's nothing too serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The ball simply bounced off, it's nothing too serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ご心配はいりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You don't need to worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You don't need to worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う少し、ここにいようかと思ったけれど、よく考えると僕はまだ昼を食べていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to stay here a little longer, but I realized I hadn't had lunch yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to stay here a little longer, but I realized I hadn't had lunch yet.

MESSAGE.JP: 食なら、人も多い。安全だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: There are a lot of people in the cafeteria. It should be safe.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are a lot of people in the cafeteria. It should be safe.

MESSAGE.JP: こで遅めの食事をとることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to have my late lunch there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to have my late lunch there.

MESSAGE.JP: ろいろと忙しかったからな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no time to spare...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no time to spare...

MESSAGE.JP: 食に行けば、恭介か誰かいるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke would be in the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke would be in the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、またね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然に、またという言葉が口をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I automatically added ❛again.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I automatically added ❛again.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい、それでは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, farewell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, farewell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は中庭を後にして、学食に向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the courtyard and headed for the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the courtyard and headed for the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 食はもう人もまばらだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There were only a few students there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were only a few students there.

MESSAGE.JP: 人にミックスフライ定食を作ってもらう。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato made me a fried combo plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato made me a fried combo plate.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ほらよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: げ物が高く積み上がった特盛りだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a special serving with fried food stacked as high as the plate could support...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a special serving with fried food stacked as high as the plate could support...

MESSAGE.JP: 食を終えると、みんな思い思いに動き出していく。
MESSAGE.EN: After lunch, we began heading out.
MESSAGE.Translation: After lunch, we began heading out.

MESSAGE.JP: て…僕はどうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Now... what should I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: Now... what should I do?

MESSAGE.JP: ドのルームメイト探しがまだ終わっていなかったな。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, we haven't finished looking for a roommate for Kud yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, we haven't finished looking for a roommate for Kud yet.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯でメールを出した後、ふたりで落ち合う。
MESSAGE.EN: I emailed her and arranged to meet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I emailed her and arranged to meet.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ではいきましょうーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's go, then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go, then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ームメイト探しを再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: We resumed searching for a roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: We resumed searching for a roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: てこの空いた時間をどう過ごそう。
MESSAGE.EN: I have a little free time right now. I wonder what I should do.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have a little free time right now. I wonder what I should do.

MESSAGE.JP: 室に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should take a rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should take a rest...

MESSAGE.JP: も特にすることもなく、教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing to do so I headed back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing to do so I headed back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 夏の太陽が作る校舎の影は短く、中庭は暖かな日射しを浴びている。
MESSAGE.EN: The school building's shadow was short, and there was plenty of warm sunshine in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school building's shadow was short, and there was plenty of warm sunshine in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: ったものの、考えたら弁当を用意していない。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I decided to remain here, I hadn't prepared any lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I decided to remain here, I hadn't prepared any lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり、学食に行こうかな。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go to the cafeteria after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go to the cafeteria after all.

MESSAGE.JP: う思った途端に、くー、と僕のお腹が鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as this crossed my mind, my stomach grumbled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as this crossed my mind, my stomach grumbled.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「まだ、お昼を食べていないのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Haven't you had lunch yet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Haven't you had lunch yet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　あ、うん…そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Uh, no... I haven't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Uh, no... I haven't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わたしを探していたからですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Is that because you were looking for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Is that because you were looking for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、それもあるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, that's part of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, that's part of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そうですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では。残り物でよろしければ、差し上げますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you don't mind, I'll give you my leftovers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you don't mind, I'll give you my leftovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　そ、それは悪いよ…大丈夫だからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? You don't have to do that... I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? You don't have to do that... I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: といった途端、またくー、とお腹が鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As I said this, another growl escaped from my stomach.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As I said this, another growl escaped from my stomach.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ごめん、じゃあちょっと貰おうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry but can I have a little...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry but can I have a little...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では…つまらないものですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Here... It's nothing special, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Here... It's nothing special, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニール袋を僕に差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a plastic bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a plastic bag.

MESSAGE.JP: 明な袋の中に見えるのは、茶色い棒みたいなものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I found something like brown sticks in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found something like brown sticks in it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これって…パンの耳？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝These are... bread crusts, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝These are... bread crusts, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは、こくんと頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…残り物だ、と最初にお断りしたはずです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I told you I'd give you my leftovers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I told you I'd give you my leftovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん、美味しいよね。パンの耳って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, they look tasty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, they look tasty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「スープに浮かべると、フランス風でセレブって感じがするよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It feels like French cuisine when you have them drifting about in a soup bowl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It feels like French cuisine when you have them drifting about in a soup bowl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それに、経済的だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And it's economical too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And it's economical too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、さすがは西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yep, you're great, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yep, you're great, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はや自分でも何を言ってるか、よく分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even I had no idea what I was talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even I had no idea what I was talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あの…わたしは何も貧乏だからパンの耳を食べているわけではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Um... It's not like I'm eating bread crusts because I'm poor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Um... It's not like I'm eating bread crusts because I'm poor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、ダイエット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, are you on a diet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, are you on a diet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんはちっちゃくて、あまりその必要はないように見えるけど。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a slender body, so I didn't really think she had need for that.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a slender body, so I didn't really think she had need for that.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いえ、それも違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, that's not it either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, that's not it either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ダイエットをするならば、もっと栄養バランスを考えなくてはいけません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If I were on a diet, I would be eating something more nutritious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If I were on a diet, I would be eating something more nutritious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「パンの耳だけでは、とても不健康ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's unhealthy if you only eat bread crusts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's unhealthy if you only eat bread crusts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…僕に、それをくれるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, you're giving them to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, you're giving them to me?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「細かいことを気にしてはいけません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You shouldn't worry about the minor details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You shouldn't worry about the minor details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ほん、と咳払いをひとつする。
MESSAGE.EN: She coughed once.
MESSAGE.Translation: She coughed once.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「今日のお昼はサンドイッチだったので、パンの耳が余ったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I had prepared sandwiches for today's lunch, and there were some crusts left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I had prepared sandwiches for today's lunch, and there were some crusts left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へえ、自分で作ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee, you made them yourself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee, you made them yourself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい。その耳を鳥にあげようと思って持ってきたんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes. I brought them to feed the birds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes. I brought them to feed the birds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「さっき直枝さんが来た時に、逃げていってしまいましたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They all flew away when you appeared, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They all flew away when you appeared, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか。ごめん、邪魔しちゃったかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. Sorry, seems I got in your way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. Sorry, seems I got in your way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりになってしまった』っていうのは、そういう意味だったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: So that's what she meant by ❛I'm alone now that you're here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: So that's what she meant by ❛I'm alone now that you're here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…いえ、構いません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No, I don't mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No, I don't mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そういうわけですから、このままでは余らせてしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's why, at this rate they'll go to waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's why, at this rate they'll go to waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「よろしければ、もらって下さい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If it's fine with you, please take them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If it's fine with you, please take them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のお腹は、もう一度くー、という音を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: My stomach rumbled again.
MESSAGE.Translation: My stomach rumbled again.

MESSAGE.JP: ごとも空腹には勝てない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no fighting against hunger.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no fighting against hunger.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、いただきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'll help myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'll help myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: からパンの耳を取り出し、一口かじる。
MESSAGE.EN: I fished out a bread crust from the bag and bit into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fished out a bread crust from the bag and bit into it.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと固いけど、かむうちに甘くなって、美味しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a little hard, but it was sweet and tasty on the inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a little hard, but it was sweet and tasty on the inside.

MESSAGE.JP: づけば、袋は空っぽだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was surprised as I was eating when I found the bag empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was surprised as I was eating when I found the bag empty.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なんか夢中になって食べちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's like I was in a trance while I was eating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's like I was in a trance while I was eating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは、ケヤキの木にもたれて座っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was resting her back against the zelkova tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was resting her back against the zelkova tree.

MESSAGE.JP: は、僕を見ていない。
MESSAGE.EN: Right now, she wasn't looking at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right now, she wasn't looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: の瞳は、何を見ているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what those eyes of hers were looking at, at that time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what those eyes of hers were looking at, at that time.

MESSAGE.JP: るいは…何を見ていないんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Or perhaps... What those eyes weren't seeing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or perhaps... What those eyes weren't seeing.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごちそうさまでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks for the treat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks for the treat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: になったビニール袋を西園さんに返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned the now empty bag to Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned the now empty bag to Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと足りないけど、学校が終わるくらいまでは大丈夫だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't enough, but it should tide me over until the end of school.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't enough, but it should tide me over until the end of school.

MESSAGE.JP: 習前に、なにか食べることにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll grab something to eat before I head off to practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll grab something to eat before I head off to practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「お粗末様でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It wasn't anything special.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It wasn't anything special.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「謙遜ではなくて、厳然たる事実ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm not being modest here, it's the undeniable truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm not being modest here, it's the undeniable truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言って、軽く微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled slightly as she said this.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled slightly as she said this.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そろそろ戻ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I should start heading back now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I should start heading back now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんが日傘を広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened her parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened her parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では、直枝さん。また、後ほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの姿が、日傘に隠れたまま遠ざかっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Her figure, hidden beneath the parasol, was slowly fading away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her figure, hidden beneath the parasol, was slowly fading away.

MESSAGE.JP: い日傘が、昼の日射しの中に揺れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her white parasol gently swayed, basking in the afternoon sunlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her white parasol gently swayed, basking in the afternoon sunlight.

MESSAGE.JP: が弱いのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have delicate skin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have delicate skin.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんはそういう風にして、いつでも日傘を差していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Regardless of the time of day, whenever I saw her she was always holding a parasol like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Regardless of the time of day, whenever I saw her she was always holding a parasol like that.

MESSAGE.JP: て…僕はどうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Now then... What should I do.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now then... What should I do.

MESSAGE.JP: ドのルームメイト探しがまだ終わっていなかったな。
MESSAGE.EN: We're not done looking for a roommate for Kud yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: We're not done looking for a roommate for Kud yet.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯でメールを出した後、ふたりで落ち合う。
MESSAGE.EN: I messaged her with my cellphone and we met up afterward.
MESSAGE.Translation: I messaged her with my cellphone and we met up afterward.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ではいきましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ームメイト探しを再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: We resumed searching for a roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: We resumed searching for a roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Break time.

MESSAGE.JP: は目覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうした、理樹。最近調子悪そうじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong? You haven't been lookin' good recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong? You haven't been lookin' good recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、大丈夫。喉が渇いただけだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing, I'm fine. I'm just thirsty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing, I'm fine. I'm just thirsty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「喉かわいたなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm so thirsty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm so thirsty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ャイムが鳴ると同時に隣の席の真人と談笑。
MESSAGE.EN: I began chatting with Masato just as the school bell rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began chatting with Masato just as the school bell rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 現国で音読を当てられたので、少し何かで喉を潤したい気分だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Reading aloud in modern Japanese class had made me thirsty.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Reading aloud in modern Japanese class had made me thirsty.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おう、飲むかこれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh here, drink this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh here, drink this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ン、と机の上に２リットルのペットボトルを置く。
MESSAGE.EN: He placed a 2 liter plastic bottle on my desk with a loud thud.
MESSAGE.Translation: He placed a 2 liter plastic bottle on my desk with a loud thud.

MESSAGE.JP: 観は緑茶のそれだが、中身はなにやら茶色い液体で満たされている。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like green tea on the outside, but there was something brown inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like green tea on the outside, but there was something brown inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なにこれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレ製マッスル・エクササイズ・ドリンクだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A ❛self-made muscle exercise drink.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A ❛self-made muscle exercise drink.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…遠慮しておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いや、待てよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But no, hold on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But no, hold on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレ製マッスル・エクササイザーのほうがカッコよくねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Doesn't ❛self-made muscle exerciser❜ sound cooler?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Doesn't ❛self-made muscle exerciser❜ sound cooler?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どっちでもいいけど、とりあえず飲まないからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're both fine, because I'm not going to drink any.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're both fine, because I'm not going to drink any.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「まっする・えくささいざーの方が断然カッコいいと思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝❛Maskuru Excersaiza-❜ definitely sounds cooler!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝❛Maskuru Excersaiza-❜ definitely sounds cooler!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だよなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝See?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝See?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んかわけのわからない結束が生まれてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, it seems like they have some unfathomable understanding of each other...
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, it seems like they have some unfathomable understanding of each other...

MESSAGE.JP: ュースを買いに行きたいところだけど…
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to go and buy some juice, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to go and buy some juice, but...

MESSAGE.JP: 朝の拷問が思い出されて、目眩がした…。
MESSAGE.EN: When I remembered the torture this morning, I got dizzy...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I remembered the torture this morning, I got dizzy...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Umm, Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Umm, Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「マッスル・エクササイザー、少しもらえない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I have some Muscle Exerciser?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I have some Muscle Exerciser?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おっと、ネーミングセンスがよすぎて理樹の興味も引いちまったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, my naming sense is so good, it's even got Riki's interest now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, my naming sense is so good, it's even got Riki's interest now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ただ喉が乾いただけだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm just thirsty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm just thirsty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ、飲めよ。クリアーな喉ごし、すきっとするぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, drink up. Quench yourself and we'll have some fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, drink up. Quench yourself and we'll have some fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はペットボトルを受け取り、一口ごくりと飲んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the bottle and drank a mouthful.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the bottle and drank a mouthful.

MESSAGE.JP: ろっ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Gulp*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gulp*...

MESSAGE.JP: わっ…なんだこれは!?
MESSAGE.EN: Gah... what is this!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Gah... what is this!?

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうだい、美味さに驚いたかい。好きなだけ飲んでいいんだぜ？」
