MESSAGE.EN: I rested for a while, and left my room to have dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rested for a while, and left my room to have dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: っていたのか、何かの帰りか、真人がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Whether he had been waiting for me or was just returning from somewhere, I ran into Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whether he had been waiting for me or was just returning from somewhere, I ran into Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「飯これからか？　つき合うぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you going to eat? I'll go with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you going to eat? I'll go with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに…ひとりきりで居るのはまずい。
MESSAGE.EN: I definitely shouldn't be alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I definitely shouldn't be alone.

MESSAGE.JP: き合ってもらおう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll have him come along.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll have him come along.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、ごめん。頼むよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, thanks. I'm counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, thanks. I'm counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いいってことよ。オレはカツでもつついてるからよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's fine. I can have some cutlet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's fine. I can have some cutlet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おやつ感覚なんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You make it sound like a snack...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You make it sound like a snack...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それをおごってくれるとすげぇ嬉しいんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'd be super happy if you treated me to some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'd be super happy if you treated me to some.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ディガード代わりだ。いいよ、と僕は頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded a yes. He can act as a bodyguard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded a yes. He can act as a bodyguard.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いゃっほぅ！　カツカツ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yahoo! Cutlet! Cutlet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yahoo! Cutlet! Cutlet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: び勇んで僕の背中を押しつつ、歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: In high spirits, he pushed me along.
MESSAGE.Translation: In high spirits, he pushed me along.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「風が涼しくて気持ちいいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The breeze feels great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The breeze feels great.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人とは風情について語り合えないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato apparently wasn't the type to talk about such things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato apparently wasn't the type to talk about such things.

MESSAGE.JP: の玄関から外に目をやったとき、近くのベンチあたりで見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴とクドだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Rin and Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Rin and Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: し珍しい組み合わせのような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It struck me that they were an unusual pairing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It struck me that they were an unusual pairing.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなことどーでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れ…さっきと同じセリフだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey... that's the same thing he said earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey... that's the same thing he said earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: は恐るべきことを考える…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should be angry...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should be angry...

MESSAGE.JP: しかして真人は、今から食べるカツにしか興味を持っていないのでは…？
MESSAGE.EN: Is Masato only interested in the cutlet I promised him...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is Masato only interested in the cutlet I promised him...?

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a pop quiz tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a pop quiz tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなことどーでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろ…。カツのことしか頭にない。

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らかにカツのことしか考えていない!!
MESSAGE.EN: He's obviously only thinking about cutlet!
MESSAGE.Translation: He's obviously only thinking about cutlet!

MESSAGE.JP: が目の前でさらわれようが、ひとりでカツを食べていそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I got the feeling that if I was abducted in front of him he'd just go eat alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got the feeling that if I was abducted in front of him he'd just go eat alone.

MESSAGE.JP: や、その支払いは僕なわけだから、僕は守ってくれるか…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, then I wouldn't be able to pay. He'll protect me...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, then I wouldn't be able to pay. He'll protect me...

MESSAGE.JP: て、それは…友達なのか？　親友なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is that what it means to be... friends? Best friends?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that what it means to be... friends? Best friends?

MESSAGE.JP: ツなしには守ってもらえない…？
MESSAGE.EN: Would he protect me if there was no cutlet...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would he protect me if there was no cutlet...?

MESSAGE.JP: な疑問がもたげてくるが、深く考えないことにしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is raising some serious doubts in my mind, but I shouldn't think about it too hard...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is raising some serious doubts in my mind, but I shouldn't think about it too hard...

MESSAGE.JP: うして、真人に付き合ってもらい、遅い夕飯を食べることに。
MESSAGE.EN: And so I went with Masato to have a late dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so I went with Masato to have a late dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいよ、それぐらい。ひとりで大丈夫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's okay. I can handle that much by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's okay. I can handle that much by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そっか。じゃ、後でな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay. I'll see you later then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay. I'll see you later then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と入れ替わりに部屋へ入っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He went into the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: He went into the room.

MESSAGE.JP: が涼しい。
MESSAGE.EN: The wind was refreshing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wind was refreshing.

MESSAGE.JP: 涼みにはちょうどいい時間だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the best time to enjoy the evening breeze.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the best time to enjoy the evening breeze.

MESSAGE.JP: の玄関から外に目をやったとき、近くのベンチあたりで見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: とクドだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: し珍しい組み合わせのような気がして、僕はそちらに足を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was unusual to see them together, so I approached them.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was unusual to see them together, so I approached them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「二人とも何してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹か、大丈夫か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, you okay now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, you okay now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「慣れてるから、平気だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm used to this, so I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm used to this, so I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、何をしてたって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what're you up to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what're you up to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「特に何もしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nothing in particular.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nothing in particular.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こんにちは、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good evening, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good evening, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もしてない、と言ったにも関わらず鈴は猫を抱いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was holding a cat in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was holding a cat in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: いつの名前はなんだっただろう…多分オードリーだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Its name was... Audrey, I think.
MESSAGE.Translation: Its name was... Audrey, I think.

MESSAGE.JP: んな鈴の足下には猫がわらわらといて、構ってほしそうにみゃーみゃーと鳴き続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: Many more cats were rubbing against her legs, seeking her attention and purring.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many more cats were rubbing against her legs, seeking her attention and purring.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは猫、好き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you like cats, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you like cats, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「好きですー。でも、もっと好きな動物はいますけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love them. But there's another animal I like even more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love them. But there's another animal I like even more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ、何？ってわかるような気もするけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see, what's that? Actually, I think I know the answer already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see, what's that? Actually, I think I know the answer already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですか？　では当ててみてくださいー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? Try to guess then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? Try to guess then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「犬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Dogs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Dogs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「即答!?　しかも正解ですーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What a quick answer! And absolutely correct too!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What a quick answer! And absolutely correct too!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、まぁ、なんとなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, yeah, thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, yeah, thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人よく見たら同属っぽいし。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at her, it seemed like she belonged to the same species.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at her, it seemed like she belonged to the same species.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「犬は飼ってないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you own a dog?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you own a dog?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「本宅、あ、おじい様の家という意味ですよ、本宅にはたくさんいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝At home, oh, I mean at my grandpa's place, I'm keeping a lot of them there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝At home, oh, I mean at my grandpa's place, I'm keeping a lot of them there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へぇそうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee, really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee, really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の一番の友達さんはこの敷地内にいるみたいなんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My best friends should be around somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My best friends should be around somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「まだ会ってません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I haven't met them yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I haven't met them yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「と、いうと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ストレルカとヴェルカはお仕事だと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Strelka and Belka are at work I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Strelka and Belka are at work I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「仕事…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝At work...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝At work...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「昼か夜の警備をしているんじゃないかと…お仕事してるなら、邪魔しちゃいけませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They may be keeping guard in the daytime and at night... If they're at work, I shouldn't bother them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They may be keeping guard in the daytime and at night... If they're at work, I shouldn't bother them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 前をあげた二匹は番犬か何かなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Those two were clearly names of watchdogs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those two were clearly names of watchdogs.

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば、女子寮の周りを風紀委員がパトロールするときに、頼もしい相棒がつくようになったとかどうとか…聞いたような。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, I'd heard something about disciplinary committee members getting themselves reliable partners for patrolling around the girls' dorm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, I'd heard something about disciplinary committee members getting themselves reliable partners for patrolling around the girls' dorm...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしは見たことがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have met them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have met them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、そうなんですか。出会ったらクドが会いたがっていたと伝えてほしいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, I see. If you see them again, please tell them that Kud wants to meet them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, I see. If you see them again, please tell them that Kud wants to meet them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わかった。モンペチ、食べる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right. Do they eat Mon Petit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right. Do they eat Mon Petit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうでしょうか…わりかし好き嫌いは無かったはずですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wonder... I don't think they have any strong preferences...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wonder... I don't think they have any strong preferences...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「モンペチで伝えるつもりなんだ、鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you going to convey it to them through Mon Petit, Rin...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you going to convey it to them through Mon Petit, Rin...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ホンヤクモンペチ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Translation Mon Petit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Translation Mon Petit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がキャットフードの缶詰を上着のポケットから出しながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said while taking out a can of cat food.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said while taking out a can of cat food.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「しないから翻訳してくれないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It won't translate anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It won't translate anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃ、そろそろ行く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, I'm off then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, I'm off then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、はい。鈴さん、ばいばいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, bye bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, bye bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は猫を抱えたまま、歩き去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked away holding the cat in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked away holding the cat in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、猫抱えたまま、どこへ行くんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where's she going, carrying a cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where's she going, carrying a cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「多分獣医さんとこではないでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Probably to see a vet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Probably to see a vet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あの猫さん、足怪我してましたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The cat had hurt its leg.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The cat had hurt its leg.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なかなか近寄ってくれなくて鈴さんが困ってたんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san couldn't get near the cat no matter what, and she didn't know what to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san couldn't get near the cat no matter what, and she didn't know what to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そこを私が通りかかって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And that's when I happened to pass by.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And that's when I happened to pass by.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ばし！　と猫を捕まえた、とか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And fast as lightning, you caught it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And fast as lightning, you caught it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえいえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, no.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, no.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはパタパタと手を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She waved her hands in denial.
MESSAGE.Translation: She waved her hands in denial.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「猫さんの習性を利用したんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I exploited a trait all cats share.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I exploited a trait all cats share.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こうやって、ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is how you do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is how you do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはベンチに置かれたままになっている紙袋を膨らませた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a paper bag that lay on the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a paper bag that lay on the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: れからベンチの下に入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: And placed it underneath it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And placed it underneath it.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「置いておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll leave it here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll leave it here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が吹いて、がさがさ、と紙袋が音を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: A gust of wind blew, and the paper bag made a rustling sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: A gust of wind blew, and the paper bag made a rustling sound.

MESSAGE.JP: の瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: At that instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that instant.

MESSAGE.JP: さがさがさがさっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Gaza*gaza*gaza*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gaza*gaza*gaza*!

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「というわけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And there you have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And there you have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、なにがというわけかわかんないよ…
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really get it...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really get it...

MESSAGE.JP: てうわ！　猫が紙袋に入ってるっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: Wh-, wait, a cat just went inside the bag!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Wh-, wait, a cat just went inside the bag!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「猫さんは紙袋とかトートバッグ好きですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Cats love paper bags and tote bags.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Cats love paper bags and tote bags.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしてなんだろう？　狭いところが好きだから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And why is that? Because they like cramped places?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And why is that? Because they like cramped places?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えーと、獲物さんがいそうだから、でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Maybe they think that it's prey?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Maybe they think that it's prey?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それにがさごそ音がすると、入っちゃわないではいられないらしいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And also, when it makes a rustling sound, they can't help but slip inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And also, when it makes a rustling sound, they can't help but slip inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こうやって怪我してる猫さんを捕まえたのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And that's how we caught the injured cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And that's how we caught the injured cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはうむ、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded emphatically.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded emphatically.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なるほど。それで鈴と一緒にいたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I see. So that's why you were with Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I see. So that's why you were with Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これで春先のお礼が一つ出来ましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I could show my gratitude to her for the early spring with this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I could show my gratitude to her for the early spring with this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは嬉しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked delighted.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked delighted.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さて、私も行かなくては、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, I've got to go too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, I've got to go too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん。またね、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, see you, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, see you, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいです。ばいばいです、しーゆーれいた～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, bye-bye, si- yu- reita-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, bye-bye, si- yu- reita-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはマントを翻して去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her mantle swayed about as she left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her mantle swayed about as she left.

MESSAGE.JP: は見送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「猫と犬、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A cat and a dog, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A cat and a dog, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にしてみて、それはまるで鈴とクドのことだよな、と僕は思ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That really was how Rin and Kud appeared to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That really was how Rin and Kud appeared to me.

MESSAGE.JP: ーっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Gauu*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gauu*.

MESSAGE.JP: が大きな音を立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: My stomach growled loudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: My stomach growled loudly.

MESSAGE.JP: っとと夕食を済ませてこよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go grab some dinner soon...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go grab some dinner soon...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よぅし、テンション上がってきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The tension's running high now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The tension's running high now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今日もいっちょやるかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's finish up today with a blast!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's finish up today with a blast!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 日からいつもの夜に戻ったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My normal nights begin again today.
MESSAGE.Translation: My normal nights begin again today.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は思わず、部屋に現れた恭介に抱きついてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking, I hugged Kyousuke who had appeared in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking, I hugged Kyousuke who had appeared in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おっと、なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh my, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh my, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「何があったかしらないが、まったく甘ちゃんだなあ、おまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what's going on, but you're such a softie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what's going on, but you're such a softie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りぐりと頭を手でこねくり回されるが、それも気持ちいい。
MESSAGE.EN: He was rubbing my head back and forth, but it felt good.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was rubbing my head back and forth, but it felt good.

MESSAGE.JP: っとそうしてほしかったぐらいだけど、みんなの目もあったので、僕は恭介から離れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted him to keep doing it forever, but everyone was watching so I pulled away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted him to keep doing it forever, but everyone was watching so I pulled away.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夜はどうしてたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What have you guys been up to at night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What have you guys been up to at night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなに訊いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴を使って、メンバー探し」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Using Rin to find new members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Using Rin to find new members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まったく上手くいってないがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It hasn't been going well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It hasn't been going well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴はどこ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where is she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where is she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「すでに寮の前でスタンバらせてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She's already standing by in front of the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She's already standing by in front of the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今日は違うミッションに挑ませる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She has a different mission today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She has a different mission today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴、聞こえるか、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you hear me? Over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you hear me? Over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『オーバー言うな、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Don't say over, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Don't say over, over.]

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's definitely dangerous, so you can't let her go. That's all I'll say.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'll work hard for you guys too. I'll do my duper duper best.]

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Fighting a mysterious lifeform.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Is it some kind of stray cat wrapped in poison ivy or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、それぐらいのもんだろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it must be something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it must be something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れで真人と謙吾は納得したようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Kengo seemed to be satisfied with his explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Kengo seemed to be satisfied with his explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: はまだ不安を拭えない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't shake off my feeling of anxiety.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't shake off my feeling of anxiety.

MESSAGE.JP: 介はその正体を知っているんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke definitely knows what the creature really is...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke definitely knows what the creature really is...

MESSAGE.JP: っているんだろうな…。本当に危険な場所になんて、鈴をひとりきりでやれはしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure he does... And he wouldn't send Rin somewhere dangerous by herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure he does... And he wouldn't send Rin somewhere dangerous by herself.

MESSAGE.JP: う考えると、真人たち同様、落ち着きを取り戻してしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: With this in mind, I could finally let myself relax like Masato and Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: With this in mind, I could finally let myself relax like Masato and Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくは鈴の歩く気配が伝わってきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: For a while we could just hear Rin walking around.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a while we could just hear Rin walking around.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『む』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Mm?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Mm?]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『猫がおびえてる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[The cats are scared.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[The cats are scared.]

MESSAGE.JP: 話越しからは、猫の鳴き声がかすかに聞こえていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the cats crying on the other end of the line.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the cats crying on the other end of the line.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「敵が近いぞ。気をつけろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The enemy is nearby. Watch your step.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The enemy is nearby. Watch your step.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たた、と小走りに駆ける足音が響く。
MESSAGE.EN: We could hear her running lightly with short steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: We could hear her running lightly with short steps.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おまえら、危ないから向こうにかくれてろ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It's dangerous for you, go hide over there.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It's dangerous for you, go hide over there.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「敵は見えるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Can you see the enemy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Can you see the enemy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『みえない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Nope.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Nope.]

MESSAGE.JP: りじりと焦れた時間だけが過ぎていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The time was dragging slowly by, making me impatient.
MESSAGE.Translation: The time was dragging slowly by, making me impatient.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『あっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Oh!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Oh!]

MESSAGE.JP: 端にノイズ交じりに鈴の声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: A strange noise was heard over her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: A strange noise was heard over her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうした！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's happening!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's happening!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おそわれた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'm being attacked.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'm being attacked.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『奴は飛んでいる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[It's flying.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[It's flying.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんとかかわせたが、おそろしく素早い』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I managed to dodge it somehow, but it's frighteningly fast.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I managed to dodge it somehow, but it's frighteningly fast.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『何かが走ってきた』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Something came running right at me.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Something came running right at me.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんとかかわせたが、おそろしく素早い』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I managed to dodge it somehow, but it's frighteningly fast.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I managed to dodge it somehow, but it's frighteningly fast.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『何かが走ってきて、爪のようなものを振り下ろした』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Something came running right at me and swung what looked like claws.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Something came running right at me and swung what looked like claws.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんとかかわせたが、おそろしくでかい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I managed to dodge it somehow, but it's frighteningly huge.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I managed to dodge it somehow, but it's frighteningly huge.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「追いつけそうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Can you follow it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Can you follow it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『無理だ。またみえなくなった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No. I can't see it anymore.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No. I can't see it anymore.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうすんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What do we do now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What do we do now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく恭介は黙る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke kept silent for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke kept silent for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「背後から襲われない位置に行って待機だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Move somewhere where it can't attack you from behind and wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Move somewhere where it can't attack you from behind and wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『了解』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「しばらく待機して、攻撃されないようなら追うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wait a bit, and if it doesn't attack you, chase after it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wait a bit, and if it doesn't attack you, chase after it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今は我慢だ。できるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You need to wait for an opportunity. Okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You need to wait for an opportunity. Okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『やってみる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'll try.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'll try.]

MESSAGE.JP: 話越しには、硬質の物体がぶつかった鈍い音が響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: A dull sound of impact came over from the cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: A dull sound of impact came over from the cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「始まったか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's started!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's started!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『倒したと思ったら、逃げていった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I was winning, but it managed to run away.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I was winning, but it managed to run away.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹にはこれをやろう。シャケ缶」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, this is for you. A can of salmon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, this is for you. A can of salmon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴っ、大丈夫かっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんとか…おーばー…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'll be fine... Over...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'll be fine... Over...]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だめだってっ、恭介に乗せられちゃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you don't need to do that anymore, Rin!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you don't need to do that anymore, Rin!❞

MESSAGE.JP: は改造携帯に向けて大声を放つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouted into the phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouted into the phone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「危険だって、被害者も出てるぐらいなんだから絶対だめっ、めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is going to be dangerous, a few guys have already been hurt by it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is going to be dangerous, a few guys have already been hurt by it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『でも、かんづめ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[But, the cans...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[But, the cans...]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕があげるからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll give you some!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll give you some!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なら戻る。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Okay, I'll be right back. Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Okay, I'll be right back. Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「早いな、おい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What a snap decision!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What a snap decision!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「本当にそれだけに釣られてたんだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝She was really doing it just for the cans...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝She was really doing it just for the cans...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「で、なんなんだ、その謎の生命体って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Say, what could that mysterious lifeform be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Say, what could that mysterious lifeform be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No clue.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No clue.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っくと謙吾が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo got to his feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo got to his feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ？　どうした、けんごっち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? What's wrong, Kengo-chi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? What's wrong, Kengo-chi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「大人だけならいいが、生徒にも被害が及びかねないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I can't let this go on. It's unacceptable that other students are getting hurt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I can't let this go on. It's unacceptable that other students are getting hurt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れだけで僕らは理解する。謙吾がその退治に向かうのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We could hear his determination from his words; he was going to destroy that monster.
MESSAGE.Translation: We could hear his determination from his words; he was going to destroy that monster.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そら、しゅしょーなこったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Mr. do-good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Mr. do-good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れ替わり、鈴が戻ってくる。ものすごい勢いでずざーっ！と僕の隣に滑り込んでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: After Kengo left, Rin slid into the room and sat down next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: After Kengo left, Rin slid into the room and sat down next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もんぺちっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Give me Mon Petit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Give me Mon Petit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、今はないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't have them right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't have them right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ぬわにぃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whaat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whaat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さあ、謙吾の戦いが始まるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look, Kengo's battle is starting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look, Kengo's battle is starting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「見えるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How can you tell?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How can you tell?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「こんな事もあろうかと、別電源を使った予備マイクを仕込んでおいた。そっちに切り替える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I thought this might happen, so I prepared a separate mic that's on a different power supply. Let's switch over to that one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I thought this might happen, so I prepared a separate mic that's on a different power supply. Let's switch over to that one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは、また改造携帯からの音に耳を凝らした。
MESSAGE.EN: We listened intently to the sounds coming over the modified cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: We listened intently to the sounds coming over the modified cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『そうか、なら戻る。オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Okay. I'll be right back. Over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Okay. I'll be right back. Over.]

MESSAGE.JP: 直に言うことを聞いてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She listened to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She listened to me.

MESSAGE.JP: うして夜も更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...
